BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Fiyokka vi birem ma kepna ir goldoŋ doogo, buɗukka valamu ir goldoŋ kep hiɗi gali.
Bulu: Nté ya abam ese ô mbe menyiʼi me mo awôm; ndam ke anyiʼi wo da a étun.
Guiziga: Ɓamtal gar na, jek naŋ metir zlum, yo ɓiɓir naŋ saŋtimetir kukur tarnaˀ nga zlum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Njuutirka kaataakowal waɗi meetir jowi, njaajirka maagal boo meetir gootel reetita walaa.
Fulfulde_DC: Njuutirka kaataakowal waɗi meetir jowi, njaajirka maagal boo meetir gootel reetita walaa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dura o te nɔ‘i nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dura o te nɔ‘i nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Kamɛtre mcɛfe nza biya ta sheghwə kwa slapesla shɛ ba'a kadzeghe kwetɛŋe slə yitea fegwele hwa'a mɛa ŋwalea dzeve ba'a kwete gasle yite nza bezlea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Plañse boñ mono geçeçre äe nen ngaä meder dwee, diy äe nen sañtimeder do renam ti dwee.

Francais: Il y avait à chaque planche deux tenons, joints l'un à l'autre : on fit de même pour toutes les planches de la Demeure.
Anglais: One board had two tenons, equally distant one from another: thus did he make for all the boards of the tabernacle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Birem ma kepna kona ka talam ma' ma', kali hay tuwamu tuwamu, biremna vi tabernaklen noŋ kaf nisi lum ki kayn nala.
Bulu: Abam ese é nga bili ayemaʼa abaé, wua bebé a wu ôvok; mebam mese ya tabernakel me mbe nalé.
Guiziga: sar avu taŋ cuw cuw, gweˀ avu cala avu cala. Ɓamtal ngir guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ, taŋ cek kanah so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jogorɗe ɗiɗi potanɗe haa kaataakowal fuu ngam jogotirgo, bana non o waɗi haa kaataakooje jooɗorde senaande fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Jogorɗe ɗiɗi potanɗe haa kaataakowal fuu ngam jogotirgo, bana non o waɗi haa kaataakooje jooɗorde senaande fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee sara yiitoo nyɛm ŋmaa e ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala kpɔk kpɔk dam lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee sara yiitoo nyɛm ŋmaa e ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala kpɔk kpɔk dam lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghɛ nyi tiɗiɗia tiɗiɗia ya bake te yayata sheghwə kwa slapesla. Tsagha te yɛ sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla ta cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke.
Tupurri: Plañse ma honla äuy hay de joñ ngeel kal jag keçeç äil äog äoge. Plañse ma ti mburyugn wo äuy hay wo de joñge dosen nono.

Francais: On fit les planches pour la Demeure : vingt planches pour la face du midi, à droite.
Anglais: And he made boards for the tabernacle; twenty boards for the south side southward:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot biremna dok-ma' kay gal ma kayamna vi tabernaklena.
Bulu: Be nga bo mebam mewôm mebaé mfaʼa ya nké.
Guiziga: A ɗiyam ɓamtal kukur cuw tir vay ruwuy ngi guɗuko,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kaataakooje ngam jooɗorde senaande: Noogas haa wuttudu fombina
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kaataakooje ngam jooɗorde senaande: Noogas haa wuttudu fombina
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o gaŋgala ɓu-yiitoo mɛ zɔk mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ war Nɛgɛb.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o gaŋgala ɓu-yiitoo mɛ zɔk mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ war Nɛgɛb.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ feɗete sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla bakemsə kezha ŋkwa nya laka bela kwa zeme ta cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke,
Tupurri: Wo nen äañ ni waçyban no kay mono, aè joñ plañse ni do äoge.

Francais: On mit sous les vingt planches quarante socles d'argent, deux socles sous chaque planche pour ses deux tenons.
Anglais: And forty sockets of silver he made under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi yor kaway doorota dok-fiɗi gaa kuɗ biremna ma dok-ma'na. Birem ma kepna hiɗi kona valam ma ma'na nisi yor dooron gaa kuɗum ma' ma'.
Bulu: Be nga bo fe metin me silba mewôm menyin e mebam mewôm mebaé si abam ese metine mebaé asu ayemaʼa abaé dé.
Guiziga: waɗ a ɗiyam li ngi naŋhay kukur mufaɗ ti ɓiri bara, asi virzi ngi ɓamtalay mizli ngir cuw tuwa, ɓamtal gar na, li ngi naŋ cuw, vur sar naŋhay mucuw na ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e kosɗe cappanɗe nayi ɗe cardi les kaataakooje man, kosɗe ɗiɗi les kaataakowal gootal haa jogorɗe maagal.
Fulfulde_DC: e kosɗe cappanɗe nayi ɗe cardi les kaataakooje man, kosɗe ɗiɗi les kaataakowal gootal haa jogorɗe maagal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee gun-aa ɓu-naar nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ wa a gun-aa yiitoo yiitoo ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala kpɔk kpɔk dam nɛ sara lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee gun-aa ɓu-naar nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ wa a gun-aa yiitoo yiitoo ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala kpɔk kpɔk dam nɛ sara lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: pa hɛ vɛsəte wəshi kentare sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla shɛhɛ wəfaɗemsə le mze kwa tɛawetɛa, wəshi kentare bake ya kwa ghɛ nyi bake te yayata sheghwə kwa slapesla.
Tupurri: AÈ äod kray ne plañsen wo glog de boo solay do naa. Plañse ma do äogn wo mokay aà lag ni äog äoge, plañse ma honla äuy de ngeel yiñ jag äe ma äog no.

Francais: Pour le second côté de la Demeure, le côté du nord, on fit vingt planches,
Anglais: And for the other side of the tabernacle, which is toward the north corner, he made twenty boards,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot biremna dok-ma' lo hay gal ma ma'na vi tabernaklena, gal ma gaana,
Bulu: Be nga bo fe mebam mewôm mebaé asu éfase baa ya tabernakel , éfase ya akôé,
Guiziga: Tir vay muŋ ngi guɗuko, a ɗiyam ɓamtalay kukur cuwo ma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi boo kaataakooje noogas haa wuttudu jooɗorde senaande woɗndu, waato wuttudu woyla,
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi boo kaataakooje noogas haa wuttudu jooɗorde senaande woɗndu, waato wuttudu woyla,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o gaŋgala ɓu-yiitoo mbɛt a nɛ mgbɔɔr si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o gaŋgala ɓu-yiitoo mbɛt a nɛ mgbɔɔr si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha ŋkwa nya laka bela kwa gwela ta cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ne, pa hɛ feɗete sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla bakemsə
Tupurri: AÈ kal joñ plañse ti jeñ mburyug ma nen äañ gloñhwede do äog lay,

Francais: ainsi que leurs quarante socles d'argent, deux socles sous chaque planche.
Anglais: And their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: yor doorot gaa kuɗum dok-fiɗi kaw, birem kep kayni yor dooron gaa kuɗum ma' ma'.
Bulu: nalé fe metin me silba mewôm menyin map, abam ese metin mebaé.
Guiziga: waɗ li ngi naŋhay kukur mufaɗ ti ɓiri bara. Ɓamtal gar na, li ngi naŋ cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: bee kosɗe maaje cappanɗe nayi ɗe cardi, kosɗe ɗiɗi les kaataakowal gootal.
Fulfulde_DC: bee kosɗe maaje cappanɗe nayi ɗe cardi, kosɗe ɗiɗi les kaataakowal gootal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa de o sara ɓu-naar nɛ bu-mbɔi a nɛnɛ yiitoo yiitoo ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa de o sara ɓu-naar nɛ bu-mbɔi a nɛnɛ yiitoo yiitoo ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a vɛsəte wəshi kentare sheghwə wəfaɗemsə le mze kwa tɛawetɛa ɓiyitsa. Wəshi kentare sheghwə ya bake kwa ghɛ nyi bake te yayata sheghwə kwa slapesla.
Tupurri: de kray ma glog äaara ma de boo solay ma do naa wo no, plañse boñ de kray glog äoge.

Francais: On fit six planches pour le fond de la Demeure, du côté de l'occident.
Anglais: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward he made six boards.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot biremna karkiya gaa kuɗ guɗukŋa, hay gal ma vulatina.
Bulu: Be nga bo mebam mesaman éfase jôb da dim.
Guiziga: Ng'asi hay ngi guɗuk, tisi pas madiɗ na, a ngam ɓamtalay merkeɗe,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kaataakooje joweego ngam wuttudu ɓaawo jooɗorde senaande, wuttudu hiirnaaŋge.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kaataakooje joweego ngam wuttudu ɓaawo jooɗorde senaande, wuttudu hiirnaaŋge.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa aa o gaŋgala mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ndaa-tua nɛ war yee-wese.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa aa o gaŋgala mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ndaa-tua nɛ war yee-wese.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha ŋkwa nya kwetere wəmbəa cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke, laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci ne, pa hɛ feɗete sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla ŋkwaŋe,
Tupurri: AÈ joñ plañse hiira' wo nen wer mburyugn wo nen pele.

Francais: Ou fit deux planches pour les angles de la Demeure, dans le fond;
Anglais: And two boards made he for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot biremna ma' kay gef tabernaklena ma gaa kuɗumna;
Bulu: Abuʼu tabernakel ese e nga bili mebam mebaé;
Guiziga: waɗ ɓamtalay cuw ngi jaha mivay ngisi haya ti ka ti ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kaataakooje ɗiɗi ngam coɓɓuli jooɗorde senaande, wuttudu ɓaawo.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kaataakooje ɗiɗi ngam coɓɓuli jooɗorde senaande, wuttudu ɓaawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o ŋma o gbaŋ yiitoo wen pi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mgbii-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o ŋma o gbaŋ yiitoo wen pi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mgbii-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: zhɛne ne, pa hɛ feɗete sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla nyi tekeleke bake kezha megwekwe nyi kwetere wəmbə.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ plañse äog ti coçoç mburyugn wo nen glogge.

Francais: elles étaient doubles depuis le bas, formant ensemble un seul tout jusqu'à leur sommet, jusqu'au premier anneau : ainsi fit-on pour toutes les deux, aux deux angles.
Anglais: And they were coupled beneath, and coupled together at the head thereof, to one ring: thus he did to both of them in both the corners.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam ay tapay tam tuwamu, tun caw ay gaa pa, sinem ma kulon juni tam tuwam ŋaa'a ŋolo hiɗi girliŋŋa; nam ma' kafe nisi lum gefem ki kayni nala.
Bulu: me too mbaʼatan a taté si a élondo jia é late me nya nlatane mfaʼa ya yôp, be nga bo nalé mebam mebaé mese e mekuʼu mebaé.
Guiziga: Sivirzi taŋ faw, amma hirnga taŋ jom arleˀe avu ɓalaŋ mudumbuŋ. A sa gam cuw taŋ rak rak, i taŋ masa jahaka mivayaya cuw taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jogorɗe ɗiɗi haa les, non boo jogorɗe ɗiɗi haa dow baŋnge halagaare. Bana non o waɗi kaataakooje coɓɓuli ɗiɗi fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Jogorɗe ɗiɗi haa les, non boo jogorɗe ɗiɗi haa dow baŋnge halagaare. Bana non o waɗi kaataakooje coɓɓuli ɗiɗi fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gbaŋ nɔ‘i nyɛi̧a nɛ ŋmaa nɛ gun-aa, ɓɛɛ wa yee ŋmaa nɛ war ŋgɔn kɔ̧ kuti koe. Wa dee hegɔ wen o gaŋgala nɔ‘i yiitoo'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gbaŋ nɔ‘i nyɛi̧a nɛ ŋmaa nɛ gun-aa, ɓɛɛ wa yee ŋmaa nɛ war ŋgɔn kɔ̧ kuti koe. Wa dee hegɔ wen o gaŋgala nɔ‘i yiitoo'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tɛahe tɛahe sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla shɛhɛ kwayite, ama pelɛghə ne, jikə hɛ kwa kwa ghate ta takase. Kanya kwetɛŋe nza ta nci bake nci ba'a ghenci ya kasheghwə nyi te yɛ megwekwe.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo de rabge see kaçaçra äog tï¡ï¡ wer le gesiñ äaa, haçaç le' go ciñ, de sa'ge go ti tipeçeçge äe de boo ma delel delele. Ti coçoç äe ma äog ma lan wo mono, aè joñ ni dosen no tawtaw lay.

Francais: Il y avait ainsi huit planches, avec leurs socles d'argent, seize socles, deux socles sous chaque planche.
Anglais: And there were eight boards; and their sockets were sixteen sockets of silver, under every board two sockets.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Biremna ay noŋ pet glafandi, hiɗi doorot yori gaa kuɗumu, doorot ta yorit noŋ pet doogo yam karkiya, gaa kuɗ birem ma kepna doorot ay ma' ma'.
Bulu: Mebam mese me mbe muam, a metin me silba map, nalé ane na metin awôm a mesaman, abam ese metin mebaé.
Guiziga: Ti duba guɗuko, a ɗiyam ɓamtalaya dangafaɗ, waɗ li ngi naŋhay kuruˀ nga merkeɗ ti ɓiri bara, asi virzi ngi ɓamtal gar na, li ngi naŋhaya cuw cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi kaataakooje joweetati bee kosɗe maaje ɗe cardi, kosɗe sappo e joweego, kosɗe ɗiɗi les kaataakowal fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi kaataakooje joweetati bee kosɗe maaje ɗe cardi, kosɗe sappo e joweego, kosɗe ɗiɗi les kaataakowal fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gaŋgala mɛ mgbii-aa nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ‘i dee gun wa nɛ bu-mbɔi, gun-aa yiitoo yiitoo tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gaŋgala mɛ mgbii-aa nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ‘i dee gun wa nɛ bu-mbɔi, gun-aa yiitoo yiitoo tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwetere wəmbəa cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke gɛ ne, deghese sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla ba'a meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe wəshi kentare hɛ nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa, geze ta ŋkɛ, bake yitea yayata sheghwə kwa slapesla.
Tupurri: Plañsen hay wo äuy dosen nono, de glog äaara ma de kray de boo solay nenma'a. Plañse boñ de kray äog äoge.

Francais: On fit des traverses de bois d'acacia, cinq pour les planches de l'un des côtés de la Demeure,
Anglais: And he made bars of shittim wood; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot malla vasl hiɗi gu-kasiyana kay ziy biremna ma hay gal ma kepna vi tabernaklena.
Bulu: Be nga bo betyengane betan a élé asé asu éfase jia ya tabernakel ,
Guiziga: A dirba nah, a ɗiyam ɓeɓele ngi ngalalay, ɓeɓele zlum ngi cica ɓamtal vay mudumbuŋhoy ngi guɗuko,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi leɗɗe gaafotooɗe bee leɗɗe gaware, jowi ngam kaataakooje wuttudu jooɗorde senaande wooru
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi leɗɗe gaafotooɗe bee leɗɗe gaware, jowi ngam kaataakooje wuttudu jooɗorde senaande wooru
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o be-saŋ mɔɔrɔ nɛ o te akasia wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala nɛ war mgbɔɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o be-saŋ mɔɔrɔ nɛ o te akasia wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala nɛ war mgbɔɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, pa hɛ feɗete sheghwə nyi kejive mbe mcɛfe yitea gwevɛre kezha sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla nyi te kwa ghate ta bela ta cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke,
Tupurri: AÈ joñ mbal koore gasiya dwee ti plañse no, ti äañ mburyugn po plañ boñ.

Francais: cinq traverses pour les planches du second côté de la Demeure, et cinq traverses pour les planches du côté de la Demeure qui en forme le fond, vers l'occident.
Anglais: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the tabernacle for the sides westward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi kot malla vasl lo kay gal ma ma'na vi tabernaklena, malla vasl kay biremna ma ka hay galla vi tabernaklena, ma gaa kuɗumna hay gal ma vulatina;
Bulu: a betyengane betan asu mebam ya éfase baa ya tabernakel , a betyengane befe betan asu mebam ya éfase tabernakel ya mvus mfaʼa jôb da dim;
Guiziga: zlum ngi cica ɓamtalay vay numuŋ ma, waɗ zlum ngi cica ɓamtal vay sihay tisi pas ngi pastaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e gaafotooɗe jowi ngam kaataakooje wuttudu jooɗorde senaande nduya, fahin gaafotooɗe jowi ngam kaataakooje wuttudu ɓaawo jooɗorde senaande, waato wuttudu hiirnaaŋge.
Fulfulde_DC: e gaafotooɗe jowi ngam kaataakooje wuttudu jooɗorde senaande nduya, fahin gaafotooɗe jowi ngam kaataakooje wuttudu ɓaawo jooɗorde senaande, waato wuttudu hiirnaaŋge.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma mɔɔrɔ woyo wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ oi-aa mɔɔrɔ wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala mɛ ndaa tua si war yee-wese.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma mɔɔrɔ woyo wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ oi-aa mɔɔrɔ wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala mɛ ndaa tua si war yee-wese.
Kapsiki_DC: sheghwə mcɛfe kezha sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla nyi te kwa bake ta bela ba'a mcɛfe kezha sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla nyi kwetere wəmbə, laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci.
Tupurri: Joñ mbal koore dwee ti plañse ma ti äañ äe ma de äog no, joñ dwee pa ti äañ mburyugn wo nen glog äe wo nen pele.

Francais: La traverse du milieu s'étendait, le long des planches, d'une extrémité à l'autre.
Anglais: And he made the middle bar to shoot through the boards from the one end to the other.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi kot malla ma jaara kay jikis hay gaŋ biremna pa ta-ta goy gaŋam gal hena.
Bulu: ane be nga bo fe tyengane ya zañe tabernakel a taté nté wua mebam ya akuʼu di akui di avok.
Guiziga: Mbal ngi wuzla, a kaka giw a didak ɓamtalay, zle a mivay hã sesẽŋ a mivay mekelem ngi guɗuko.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi gaafotooŋgal cakaawal dow kaataakooje, ngal gootal diga soɓɓundu ndu'u haa soɓɓundu nduya.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi gaafotooŋgal cakaawal dow kaataakooje, ngal gootal diga soɓɓundu ndu'u haa soɓɓundu nduya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa gita ŋma kpaakpee see-a nɛ nú-a hegɔ gɔm ndaa-a mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa gita ŋma kpaakpee see-a nɛ nú-a hegɔ gɔm ndaa-a mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma sheghwə nya jive te tepe ne, jive mbe tepe ta sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla nyi veyi hɛ, slə te kwete bela hwa'a te kwete bela ta cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ mbal koo ti gisiëgi ma caa nen plañsen äañla ka' haçaç cegaë go äañla.

Francais: On revêtit d'or les planches, et l'on fit d'or leurs anneaux qui recevaient les traverses, et l'on revêtit d'or les traverses.
Anglais: And he overlaid the boards with gold, and made their rings of gold to be places for the bars, and overlaid the bars with gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Biremna nisi korom tuwam hiɗi ora, girliŋ ma talamna ma kal malla hayna kaw nisi korom tuwam hiɗi ora, malla kaw nisi korom tuwam hiɗi ora.
Bulu: Be nga yañe mebam a mvot, be bo fe bilondo biab a mvot mfaʼa ya some be tyengane, betyengane bete be too fe nyañan a mvot.
Guiziga: Ɓamtalay ati ɓeɓelehey gar, a puyaka taŋ ɓiri tapasl tapasl, waɗ a ɗiyam ɓalaŋ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl, ɓa ngi ci ɓeɓelehey anga.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O suddi kaataakooje bee kaŋŋeeri. O waɗi kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri ngam jogaago gaafotooɗe, o suddi gaafotooɗe boo bee kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O suddi kaataakooje bee kaŋŋeeri. O waɗi kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri ngam jogaago gaafotooɗe, o suddi gaafotooɗe boo bee kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ o gaŋgala nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa a o koe lɔr nú-a, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ o gaŋgala nɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧ o koe nɔ‘i mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ o gaŋgala nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa a o koe lɔr nú-a, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ o gaŋgala nɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧ o koe nɔ‘i mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ fikɛ sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla ba'a sheghwə kejive nyi mbe le mze kwa tere tere, pa hɛ vɛsəte yɛ takase le mze kwa tere tere kezha ha sheghwə nyighɛ jive mbe.
Tupurri: AÈ äod boo biñni go ne plañsen wo ti, joñ go ne boore ma delel delel do äeegen äaaran wo ti ma heer jag koo mbal wo no, aè joñ go ne koore mbaln wo ti lay.

Francais: On fit le voile de pourpre violette, de pourpre écarlate, de cramoisi, et de lin retors; on y représenta des chérubins figurés : ouvrage d'un habile tisseur.
Anglais: And he made a veil of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen: with cherubims made he it of cunning work.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sligar-gaɓayna nisi kotom hiɗi baraw ma tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna hiɗi ma tuwam slawna, hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna, nisi kotom hiɗi yal ŋolo, nisi ɗo keruben* talamu may.
Bulu: Be nga kôm éyé ja kandé tabernakel nyôle blum, mfô, évele a nya ndomboo ntiñan abeñ.
Guiziga: Misina ɗiya gwatay, a jam zana ngi njir njar ngi tika hiri, ti gugumay mislirkeɗ lahaɗ ti ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy, munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe, ndezze, waɗ geˀ geˀ wuya ti  kerubeŋhey .
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi wiirndallo bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy. Tuppitoowo baawɗo tuppiti ngo bee suuraaji keruba'en.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi wiirndallo bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy. Tuppitoowo baawɗo tuppiti ngo bee suuraaji keruba'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee ŋma babir-laa nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap  keribim  sɛnɛ nɛ de-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee ŋma babir-laa nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap  keribim  sɛnɛ nɛ de-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka tsa zlave tsate mayafe le pawa nyi berete berete, welaɗe mbe shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ. Pa hɛ tsate pa ta ka shɛrəbɛŋe dzeyi te kezha pesa.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ oçoçbe ma caa nen tiñn de saale ma de seçeç cuwa, de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ, de leçeç ma kefkefe. AÈ joñn de äo'ge de wore, kal joñ kerubeçeç wo ti äe.

Francais: On fit pour lui quatre colonnes d'acacia, revêtues d'or, avec des crochets d'or; et l'on fondit pour elles quatre socles d'argent.
Anglais: And he made thereunto four pillars of shittim wood, and overlaid them with gold: their hooks were of gold; and he cast for them four sockets of silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot dolla valam fiɗi hiɗi gu-kasiyana, korom tuwam hiɗi ora; sle ma gaɓna ma talamna mi ora, nisi yor doorota gaa kuɗum fiɗi.
Bulu: Be nga bo mekôn me asé menyin asu éyé te be mane fe yañe me a mvot, be futi fe akobe mvot été, be mane nyemé metin me silba e mekôn mete si.
Guiziga: A ciɗam ɓamtal ngi ngalalayay mufaɗ, waɗ kor kor ɓiri tapasl tapasl avu taŋ, a ngam ponti ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl avu taŋ, ngi njira zana ngi tika hiri tuwa. Li ngi naŋhaya mufaɗ, a paka taŋ ti ɓiri bara.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗani ngo daŋraŋge nayi ɗe leɗɗe gabde. O suddi ɗe bee kaŋŋeeri. Ɓilduɗe maaje boo ɗe kaŋŋeeri. O ɓolwini ngam maaje kosɗe nayi ɗe cardi.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗani ngo daŋraŋge nayi ɗe leɗɗe gabde. O suddi ɗe bee kaŋŋeeri. Ɓilduɗe maaje boo ɗe kaŋŋeeri. O ɓolwini ngam maaje kosɗe nayi ɗe cardi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o mbiŋ naar nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ lɔr sɛnɛ, in o boi-kɔk-mɔ lɔr; bɛɛ wa dui bu-mbɔi de nɛ gun-aa naar mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o mbiŋ naar nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ lɔr sɛnɛ, in o boi-kɔk-mɔ lɔr; bɛɛ wa dui bu-mbɔi de nɛ gun-aa naar mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ feɗete selə wəfaɗe yitea gwevɛre ba'a fiaghe mze kwa tere tere kənəa hɛ. Te hɛ ndɛaŋete mayafe mbeli le ndɛaŋe nyi le mze kwa tere tere. Pa vɛsəte wəshi kentare seləa shɛhɛ wəfaɗe le mze kwa tɛawetɛa.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ gefay koo gasiya ma kiñkiñ wo ne hen naa, kal äo' boo biñni go ti äaara. Boore ma äal ragen hay wo de boo biñni, aè yor kray ma glog äaaran de boo solay.

Francais: On fit pour l'entrée de la tente un rideau en pourpre violette, pourpre écarlate, cramoisi et lin retors, ouvrage d'un dessin varié.
Anglais: And he made an hanging for the tabernacle door of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, of needlework;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay vun-guɗukŋa, nisi kot sligar-gaɓayna hiɗi ma baraw ma tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna hiɗi ma slawna, hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna, nam ciliy ŋaa'a ŋolo.
Bulu: Be nga tyelé éyé é too blum, mfô, évele a nyaa ndomboo ntiñan anyiine mbé ya nda éndélé; é mbe éyé é ne ve ntiñan.
Guiziga: Misina dira ˀay ngi zanahay, a tufam zana mekelem ngi njir, a tufaka ti gugumay mislirkeɗ lahaɗ ti ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi wiirndallo ngam dammugal laymaaru bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, ɗum tuppitaaɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi wiirndallo ngam dammugal laymaaru bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, ɗum tuppitaaɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee laa-kpe-nú tua nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi-tok-laa a̧ dee tom-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee laa-kpe-nú tua nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi-tok-laa a̧ dee tom-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha ŋkwa kedzembe cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva shɛ tekeleke ne, pa ka tsa zlave tsate kwete mayafe le pawa nyi berete berete, welaɗe mbe shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ oçoçbe ma ti ngeel kalge wo jag tiñn de saale ma de seçeç cuwa, de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ de leçeç ma kefkefe. AÀ hay diñ joñre ma de äo'ge.

Francais: On fit pour ce rideau cinq colonnes et leurs crochets et l'on revêtit d'or leurs chapiteaux et leurs tringles; leurs cinq socles étaient d'airain.
Anglais: And the five pillars of it with their hooks: and he overlaid their chapiters and their fillets with gold: but their five sockets were of brass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot dolla valam vasl hiɗi sle ma gaɓ talamna, yalam ma dilarayna hiɗi zigew ma kal sligar hayamna, diram ma yori gaa kuɗum vaslna mi wayna.
Bulu: Be nga kôme mekôn metan ya éndélé te a akob dap, be yañe fe soʼo mekôn a mendé ya été a mvot ve metin metan bap me mbe mboon a mvot.
Guiziga: Yo ma na, a ɗiyam ɓamtalay zlum ngi njira zana ngi tika hiri, pontihey kaˀ kaˀ avu taŋ, vay muŋ naŋhay waɗ ponti naŋhaya, a puyaka taŋ ɓiri tapasl tapasl, yo li ngi naŋhay muzlum na, a puyaka taŋ ɓiri gaza.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi daŋraŋge maago jowi e ɓilduɗe maaje e gaafe maaje bee kaŋŋeeri. Kosɗe maaje jowi ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi daŋraŋge maago jowi e ɓilduɗe maaje e gaafe maaje bee kaŋŋeeri. Kosɗe maaje jowi ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o mbiŋ mɔɔrɔ in o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o gan-ndui, in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa. Wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de gun-aa mɔɔrɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o mbiŋ mɔɔrɔ in o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o gan-ndui, in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa. Wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de gun-aa mɔɔrɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha mayafe ne, pa mbeli feɗete selə mcɛfe, vɛsəte yɛ ndɛaŋe ba'a yɛ geta. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, pa mbeli fikɛ ghəa selə nyi nza pəkələ yite ba'a yɛ geta le mze kwa tere tere. Ma wəshi kentare selə nyi mcɛfe nyi ne, le mze kwa ghwə ghwə vɛsəte hɛ mbeli.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ gefay wo ne hen ni dwee, de boore ma äal ragen wo no. AÈ kal äo' boo biñni go ne hen ti äaara ma de dela'gen wo no, de boore ma de yer oçoçbe äaaran wo no. Day kray ma glog äaaran hay wo diñ de boo dobe.

Francais: Il la revêtit d'or pur, en dedans et en dehors, et il y fit une guirlande d'or tout autour.
Anglais: And he overlaid it with pure gold within and without, and made a crown of gold to it round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hayam ma kalafn lay, ŋorom lay, nam korom hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna. Gaŋam kaf nam korom hiɗi ora.
Bulu: Ane a nga yañe je atan a été a mvot a ne mfuban; nde fe a nga bo nkôngô mvot mbômaʼane mekuʼu mese.
Guiziga: Besalel a kuroŋ ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, ti huroˀo waɗ ti vra naŋ gar, a kaŋ teŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl a mivay naŋ gun.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O suddi ndu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, nder e yaasi fuu. O taarni sera maaru bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O suddi ndu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, nder e yaasi fuu. O taarni sera maaru bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧a̧ lɔr nɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo be lɔr zik nɛ nú-a lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧a̧ lɔr nɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo be lɔr zik nɛ nú-a lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Bɛsalɛl fikɛ ŋkwa nya kwa hwəa ŋkɛ ba'a nya te wəmbəa ŋkɛ le mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe, pa menete mze kwa tere tere dzasle dzeyi mɛa mɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ äo' boo biñni de see äe tawa go ne hen ti, nen äil lay nen faale lay, kal äo' boo biñni go ne hen jag deleñleñ äuy.

Francais: Il fondit pour elle quatre anneaux d'or, qu'il mit à ses quatre pieds, deux anneaux d'un côté et deux anneaux de l'autre.
Anglais: And he cast for it four rings of gold, to be set by the four corners of it; even two rings upon the one side of it, and two rings upon the other side of it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yor girliŋ-ora fiɗi, lakam goy hay gefem ma fiɗina, girliŋ-ora ma ma'na hay gefem ma hena, ma ma'na lo hay gefem hena may.
Bulu: Nde a nga nyemé bilondo binyin ya futi mekuʼu menyin ya été, éfase ése bilondo bibaé.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓalaŋhay mufaɗ, a nga taŋ a mivay ngi akoti, cuw ti ka cuw ti ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O ɓolini ngam maaru kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri nayi ngam coɓɓuli maaru nayi, kalagaaje ɗiɗi haa wuttudu wooru, non boo kalagaaje ɗiɗi haa wuttudu nduya.
Fulfulde_DC: O ɓolini ngam maaru kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri nayi ngam coɓɓuli maaru nayi, kalagaaje ɗiɗi haa wuttudu wooru, non boo kalagaaje ɗiɗi haa wuttudu nduya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ duia kana naar nɛ lɔr a dam naŋ kuɓa'i, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ duia kana naar nɛ lɔr a dam naŋ kuɓa'i, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte takase wəfaɗe yitea mze kwa tere tere, pa veveyi hɛ te megwekwe nyi wəfaɗe te səndəkwə, bake laka kwete bela, bake laka kwete.
Tupurri: AÈ kal joñ boore ma delel delel do äeege naa de boo biñni, kal heer rage go ti coçoç äen wo naa äuy.

Francais: Il fit des barres de bois d'acacia et les revêtit d'or.
Anglais: And he made staves of shittim wood, and overlaid them with gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot malla hiɗi gu-kasiyana, korom tuwam hiɗi ora:
Bulu: Ane a nga bo mimbôñ mi asé a yañ mie mvot.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓeɓele ngi ngalalayay cuw, a kuro taŋ ɓiri tapasl tapasl,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa o ɓira-te akasia ɓɛɛ sɔ̧ ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ nɛ lɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa o ɓira-te akasia ɓɛɛ sɔ̧ ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ nɛ lɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ feɗete geta bake yitea gwevɛre ba'a fiaghe mze kwa tere tere kənəa hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal joñ koore ma lamma lamma wo, day kal äo' boo biñni go ne hara ti.

Francais: Il passa les barres dans les anneaux sur les côtés de l'arche, pour la porter.
Anglais: And he put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, to bear the ark.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kal malla hay girliŋŋa ma ka ciy goy gaŋ timgilla kay ziy timgilla hiɗi namu.
Bulu: Ane a nga some mimbôñ mite e bilondo e mekuʼu ya éwolo mfaʼa ya beʼe je.
Guiziga: a ca taŋ ar ɓalaŋhay misi ti ka ti ka avu akoti tuwa, ɓa a zuɓaka ti naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nastini cabbi nder kalagaaje haa buttuli sundukru, ngam roondaago ndu.
Fulfulde_DC: O nastini cabbi nder kalagaaje haa buttuli sundukru, ngam roondaago ndu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ yura te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ o kana ká̧ kuɓa wen gɔa-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ yura te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ o kana ká̧ kuɓa wen gɔa-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli hame hɛ mbe takase nyi dzeyi vare yɛ bela ta səndəkwə kezha kele te.
Tupurri: AÈ kal heer koore ma lamma lamman wo äil boore ma delel delel do äeegen ti jeñ komrom no, ma soëge äe.

Francais: Il fit un propitiatoire d'or pur; sa longueur était de deux coudées et demie, sa largeur d'une coudée et demie.
Anglais: And he made the mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half was the length thereof, and one cubit and a half the breadth thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot goɓolokona hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna; fiyokka valamu ir goldoŋ ma' hiɗi gali, buɗukka valamu ir goldoŋ kep hiɗi gali.
Bulu: Ane a nga bo ébutaʼa éwolo a mvot a dañe mfuban; ébutaʼa te é too nté menyiʼi me mo mebaé a étun a ndam anyiʼi wo da a étun.
Guiziga: Yo a ɗiya mi ngi akoti ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, jek naŋ metir pal ti saŋtimetir kukur cuw nga zlum, sliprik naŋ saŋtimetir kukur tarnaˀ nga zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi jooɗorde ngam kefergal nde kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi. Njuutirka maare meetir gootel bee reetita, njaajirka maare boo meetir gootel reetita walaa.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi jooɗorde ngam kefergal nde kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi. Njuutirka maare meetir gootel bee reetita, njaajirka maare boo meetir gootel reetita walaa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa mɔɔ-gu-zu-a nɛ lɔr, dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa mɔɔ-gu-zu-a nɛ lɔr, dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte wəsə keŋzle səndəkwə yitea mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe. Ma wəsə keŋzlea shɛ ne, dzeghe bake ba'a kwete gasle yite biya ta ŋkɛ ba'a dzeghe kwetɛŋe ba'a kwete gasle yite bezlea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal joñ jag komromn de boo biñni de see äe tawa. Depaçaçge äe hay nen ngaä sañtimeder kis ti äe do äog ti dwee, diy äe hay ngaä sañtimeder do renam ti äe dwee.

Francais: Il fit deux chérubins d'or; il les fit d'or battu, aux deux extrémités du propitiatoire,
Anglais: And he made two cherubims of gold, beaten out of one piece made he them, on the two ends of the mercy seat;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot keruben* ma' hiɗi ora; nam kotom hiɗi or ma tayayna, nam lakam goy hay vun timgilla gal ma' pete.
Bulu: Ane a nga bo besérafeñ bebaé a mvot e mekuʼu mebaé ya ébutaʼa; a nga bo be a mvot ane mbiban;
Guiziga: Dar a vuɗ  kerubeŋhey   cuw ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, kaˀ kaˀ a mivay ngi mi naŋ ti ka ti ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi keruba'en ɗiɗo bee kaŋŋeeri tappaandi haa seɓattooji jooɗorde ngam kefergal ɗiɗi,
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi keruba'en ɗiɗo bee kaŋŋeeri tappaandi haa seɓattooji jooɗorde ngam kefergal ɗiɗi,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ de o  keribim  yiitoo nɛ lɔr a ká̧ nu mɔɔ-kpe-nú-a nɛ mgbɔɔr, in nɛ mgbɔɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ de o  keribim  yiitoo nɛ lɔr a ká̧ nu mɔɔ-kpe-nú-a nɛ mgbɔɔr, in nɛ mgbɔɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəate ka shɛrəbɛŋe bake le mze kwa tere tere te bela nyi bake te wəsə keŋzle.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ kerubeçeç wo äog de boo biñni ma de tooge, aà wo de lagge ti tawge ti jag komrom ma äog wo no.

Francais: un chérubin à l'une des extrémités et un chérubin à l'autre extrémité; il fit les chérubins sortant du propitiatoire à ses deux extrémités.
Anglais: One cherub on the end on this side, and another cherub on the other end on that side: out of the mercy seat made he the cherubims on the two ends thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Keruben ma kepna goy hay vunam hena, kep goy hay vunam hena may; nisi kot keruben kayni, nam suw goy kay gaŋ goɓolokon ma' pete.
Bulu: Sérafeñ wua éfase ji a nyô mbok, éfase évok; a nga bo besérafeñ nlatan a mekuʼu mebaé ya ébutaʼa.
Guiziga: Kerubeŋhey mucuw na, taŋ surlum jom ati mi naŋ a mivay naŋhaya ti ka ti ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: keruba gooto haa seɓatto wuttudu wooru, keruba feere boo haa seɓatto wuttudu nduya. O waɗi keruba'en ɗiɗo, ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee seɓattooji maare ɗiɗi fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: keruba gooto haa seɓatto wuttudu wooru, keruba feere boo haa seɓatto wuttudu nduya. O waɗi keruba'en ɗiɗo, ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee seɓattooji maare ɗiɗi fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee  keribim  kpɔk nɛ ká̧ nú-a kpɔk, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa duk nɛ ɓii ká̧ nú-a; wa nɔi̧a o  keribim  nɔ‘i ndaɗi sɛn zu mɔɔ-kpe-nú-a'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee  keribim  kpɔk nɛ ká̧ nú-a kpɔk, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa duk nɛ ɓii ká̧ nú-a; wa nɔi̧a o  keribim  nɔ‘i ndaɗi sɛn zu mɔɔ-kpe-nú-a'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka Shɛrəbɛŋe nyi bake nyi ne, ndendeɓe hɛ te wəsə keŋzle, te bela ta ŋkɛ nyi bake.
Tupurri: Kerubeçeç go ti tawge ti jag äe äañla lay, go ti tawge ti jag äe äañla lay. AÈ joñ ra mono kerubeçeçn wo go de joñge diñ de jag komromn see keçeç humlum äuy tuseñ.

Francais: Les chérubins avaient leurs ailes déployées vers le haut, couvrant de leurs ailes le propitiatoire, et se faisant face l'un à l'autre; les faces des chérubins étaient tournées vers le propitiatoire.
Anglais: And the cherubims spread out their wings on high, and covered with their wings over the mercy seat, with their faces one to another; even to the mercy seatward were the faces of the cherubims.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kerubena gilaŋatsi ka meɗay goy kay goɓolokona, gilaŋatsi ka bar yam goɓolokona, ka ɗuw tuwsiya, irsi ka muɗi kir goɓolokona.
Bulu: Besérafeñ be same mefabe mabe yôp, be butiʼi ébutaʼa a mefabe mete be lôane fe mesu. Mesu Besérafeñ me mbe me lôô ébutaʼa.
Guiziga: Taŋ hiri pulaˀ ng'ar cala ng'ar cala, hiri tataˀ avu akoti, kirpaslaya nga muŋ nga muŋ, ara jiginaka mi ngi akoti.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Keruba'en mbeeɗi bileeji muuɗum'en haa dow, ɓe mbaɗi ɗowdi dow jooɗorde ngam kefergal bee bileeji maɓɓe. Geese maɓɓe tiitotiri, ɗon ndaara jooɗorde ngam kefergal.
Fulfulde_DC: Keruba'en mbeeɗi bileeji muuɗum'en haa dow, ɓe mbaɗi ɗowdi dow jooɗorde ngam kefergal bee bileeji maɓɓe. Geese maɓɓe tiitotiri, ɗon ndaara jooɗorde ngam kefergal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O  keribim  nɔ‘i nyara ɓaa-wa kpe nɛ zu mɔɔ-kpe-nú kuɓa. Wa yora tan nɛ ŋmaa, zɔk nɛ mɔɔ-kpe-nú kuɓa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O  keribim  nɔ‘i nyara ɓaa-wa kpe nɛ zu mɔɔ-kpe-nú kuɓa. Wa yora tan nɛ ŋmaa, zɔk nɛ mɔɔ-kpe-nú kuɓa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa kema kwa kema hɛ ba'a laka wəsə keŋzle nya ya hɛ le bidzəa nci nyi pepelake kema ta nci.
Tupurri: Kerubeçeçn hay wo go de blar grañ äaara ti kaykay, hay wo de hul grañ äaara ne jag komrom ti, blam äe hay wo de ngië nen äaara ne kaçaçra ti. Nen kerubeçeçn hay wo de kañge diñ ne jag komromn ti.

Francais: Il fit la table de bois d'acacia ; sa longueur était de deux coudées, sa largeur d'une coudée, et sa hauteur d'une coudée et demie.
Anglais: And he made the table of shittim wood: two cubits was the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot tablena hiɗi gu-kasiyana, fiyokka valam ir goldoŋ ma', buɗukka valamu ir goldoŋ kep, fiyokka valam ta kulota ir goldoŋ kep hiɗi gali.
Bulu: A nga kôme tebele a asé; nté ô too menyiʼi me mo mebaé, ndam anyiʼi wo da a nkôñe yôp anyiʼi wo da a étun.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Besalel a ɗiyi tabul ti dum ngi ngalalay. Jek naŋ metir pal, sliprik naŋ reta metir, gil naŋ saŋtimetir kukur tarnaˀ nga zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi taabal bee leggal gawaral. Njuutirka maagal meetir gootel, njaajirka maagal, reeta meetir, towirka maagal boo meetir gootel reetita walaa.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi taabal bee leggal gawaral. Njuutirka maagal meetir gootel, njaajirka maagal, reeta meetir, towirka maagal boo meetir gootel reetita walaa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee taŋe-e-nyɔŋ-mɔ nɛ te akasia. Dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee taŋe-e-nyɔŋ-mɔ nɛ te akasia. Dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Bɛsalɛl baŋete tabele yitea gwevɛre. Kadzeghe bake slə yitea fegwele hwa'a mɛa ŋwalea dzeve biya ta ŋkɛ, dzeghe kwetɛŋe bezlea ŋkɛ ba'a dzeghe kwetɛŋe ba'a kwete gasle yite dzeme ghweme ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ tablen de koo gasiya. Depaçaçge äe hay nen ngaä meder boñ, diy äe nen sañtimeder do renam ti dwee, geçeçre äe ciñ nen ngaä sañtimeder do renam ti dwee.

Francais: Il la revêtit d'or pur, et y mit une guirlande d'or tout autour.
Anglais: And he overlaid it with pure gold, and made thereunto a crown of gold round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam korom tuwam hiɗi or ma bay rigasna, nam ŋuyum gaŋam hiɗi or kafe.
Bulu: A nga yañe je a mvot a dañe mfuban a bo fe nkôngô mvot mbômaʼane.
Guiziga: A sirta sirit ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, a kaŋ teŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl a mivay naŋ gun.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O suddi ngal bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, o taarni sera maagal bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O suddi ngal bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, o taarni sera maagal bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ yɔka ɗoŋ-aa nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo be lɔr zik nɛ nú-a lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ yɔka ɗoŋ-aa nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo be lɔr zik nɛ nú-a lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ fiaghe mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe kənə ba'a meneyi mze kwa tere tere dzasle dzeyi mɛa mɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ äo' boo biñni go ne hen faale de see äe tawa, äo' boo biñni go ne hen faale de see äe tawa, äo' boo biñni go ne hen jag deleñleñ äuy.

Francais: Il lui fit à l'entour un châssis d'une palme, et il fit une guirlande d'or au châssis tout autour.
Anglais: Also he made thereunto a border of an handbreadth round about; and made a crown of gold for the border thereof round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot gu mara'a, ŋuyum goy gaŋam cusl', be'da valam ŋaɓ cita-ɓamta fiɗi', nam korom tuwam noŋ kaf hiɗi ora.
Bulu: A nga bo filim mbômaʼane été a bo fe nkôngô été a mvot mbômaʼane filim.
Guiziga: Dum misi ɓiɓir naŋ saŋtimetir dangafaɗ, a ka taŋ gilaɗ gilaɗ ar cakay naŋhay mufaɗ taŋ, waɗ teŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl ɓaˀa ava ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗani ngal faddorde nde hapakaare, haa buttuli nayi fuu. O taarni sera faddorde bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗani ngal faddorde nde hapakaare, haa buttuli nayi fuu. O taarni sera faddorde bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o ndota nú-a nɛ lɔr, pɛsa-a hee ŋgɛɗɛ-er-wi ga si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓo lɔr zik nɛ nú-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o ndota nú-a nɛ lɔr, pɛsa-a hee ŋgɛɗɛ-er-wi ga si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓo lɔr zik nɛ nú-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma dzeyi vare bela ta ŋkɛ nyi wəfaɗe ne, pa meneyi sheghwə kwa slapesla gare bezlea hwə dzeve ba'a pa meneyi mze kwa tere tere dzasle dzeyi mɛa mɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ äo' ëiñëiñ po ti jeñ äe de diy nen ngaä sañtimeder nenma'a, äo' boo biñni go ti jeñ äe deleñleñ äuy.

Francais: Il fondit pour la table quatre anneaux d'or, et il mit les anneaux aux quatre coins, qui sont à ses quatre pieds.
Anglais: And he cast for it four rings of gold, and put the rings upon the four corners that were in the four feet thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yor girliŋ-ora fiɗi', cum goy hay gefem ma fiɗina, ma ka tam selem ma fiɗina kaw.
Bulu: Ane a nga nyemé bilondo bi mvot binyin asu tebele a futi bie mekuʼu menyin ma tôban a mebo menyin.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓalaŋhay mufaɗ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, a nga taŋ a mivay naŋhay mufaɗ taŋ, gweˀ gweˀ avu sar naŋhay mumufaɗ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O ɓolini ngam maagal kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri nayi. O feɗi ɗe haa coɓɓuli nayi gonɗi haa kosɗe maagal.
Fulfulde_DC: O ɓolini ngam maagal kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri nayi. O feɗi ɗe haa coɓɓuli nayi gonɗi haa kosɗe maagal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ nɔi̧a lɔr de nɛ kana naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ a dam mgbii-aa naar'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ nɔi̧a lɔr de nɛ kana naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ a dam mgbii-aa naar'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte takase wəfaɗe le mze kwa tere tere ba'a veveyi hɛ te megwekwe nyi wəfaɗe, takwa yitea seɗa nyi wəfaɗe.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ boo biñni delel delel do äeege naa see table no, heer boore ma delel delel do äeegen wo ti coçoç äe ma naa wo no, go ti äaale äen wo naa äuy.

Francais: Les anneaux étaient près du châssis pour recevoir les barres qui doivent porter la table.
Anglais: Over against the border were the rings, the places for the staves to bear the table.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Girliŋŋa ɓalay kulo goboy tam gaŋamu, malla ka kali hayamu kay ziy tablena.
Bulu: Bilondo bi mbe bebé filim, mimbôñ mi tulaʼan été mfaʼa mbeʼan tebele.
Guiziga: Ɓalaŋhaya taŋ gweˀ avu dum ngir cakay naŋhay tuwa, ɓa a caka ɓeɓele ngi zuɓ naŋ ar taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kalagaaje man laati ɓadiiɗe faddorde, ɗe njogo cabbi ngam roondaago taabal.
Fulfulde_DC: Kalagaaje man laati ɓadiiɗe faddorde, ɗe njogo cabbi ngam roondaago taabal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O kana nɔ‘i yaa mgbii-aa ha'i mɛ a o te sɛnɛ wen gɔa-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O kana nɔ‘i yaa mgbii-aa ha'i mɛ a o te sɛnɛ wen gɔa-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma takasea shɛhɛ ne, dekwe yitea sheghwə kwa slapesla veveyi hɛ ŋkɛ kezha nza geta nyi tekele tabele mbeli te mbe hɛ.
Tupurri: Boore ma delel delel do äeegen wo go de toçëge see ëiñëiñ ma ti jeñ äe no, day koore ma lamma lamman wo de heerge äil äe ma soë table no.

Francais: Il fit les barres de bois d'acacia et les revêtit d'or; elles servaient à porter la table.
Anglais: And he made the staves of shittim wood, and overlaid them with gold, to bear the table.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot malla hiɗi gu-kasiyana, korom tuwam hiɗi ora; lopna valam kayni kay ziy tablena.
Bulu: A nga kôme mimbôñ mite a asé a mane fe yañe mie mvot; mi nga volô mbeʼan tebele.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓeɓele ngi ngalalayay cuw ngi zuɓ naŋ, a kuro taŋ ɓiri tapasl tapasl sirit wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee kaŋŋeeri, ngam roondaago taabal.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee kaŋŋeeri, ngam roondaago taabal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o ŋma dura te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ-aa, wen gɔa-a nɛ taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o ŋma dura te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ-aa, wen gɔa-a nɛ taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ feɗete geta bake yitea gwevɛre, pa fiaghe mze kwa tere tere kənəa hɛ. Te hɛ tekele tabele mbeli.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ koore ma lamma lamman wo de koo gasiya. Kal äo' boo biñni go ne hara ti, aà hay wo diñ ma soë table no.

Francais: Il fit les ustensiles qu'on devait mettre sur la table, ses plats, ses cassolettes, ses coupes et ses tasses pour servir aux libations ; il les fit d'or pur.
Anglais: And he made the vessels which were upon the table, his dishes, and his spoons, and his bowls, and his covers to cover withal, of pure gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot jak ma lakam kay tabella; zlarak ora, kaway ma niyna, tasana hiɗi ŋalayna, kay li vulda ta yama' goyta; nam kot kayni kaf hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna;
Bulu: Ane a nga kôme biôm ya belan bie tebele: Bisua, bilaé mevale mebaé a mekob minlak asu nsôban mo a mebo: Biôm bite bi nga boban a mvot.
Guiziga: Gazlanga ngir tabuloyo, a ɗiya taŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ: taasa mupuɗaˀ puɗaˀhay, taasa ngi yamay, kopoy waɗ gwat ngi pusla mbaazlahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kuuje gonɗe dow taabal: Taasaaje e taasahoy e jarduɗe e bulki ngam lii'aago dokke dufeteeɗe. O waɗi ɗum fuu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kuuje gonɗe dow taabal: Taasaaje e taasahoy e jarduɗe e bulki ngam lii'aago dokke dufeteeɗe. O waɗi ɗum fuu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o nyɛk nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr wen aa-a zu taŋe-nyɔŋmɔ, o tasi, o be ɗele, o ɓii in o be yee wen tɛna-a nɛ zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o nyɛk nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr wen aa-a zu taŋe-nyɔŋmɔ, o tasi, o be ɗele, o ɓii in o be yee wen tɛna-a nɛ zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte wəshi kemene slene te tabele le mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe: yɛ parantɛ, yɛ tasa, yɛ kwalekwə ba'a yɛ ghwelepe tɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal joñ feçeçre maga hay wo ma laage ti tablen mono. Haçaçre äen wo, geëegre äen wo, kobre äen wo, diñ ma kag yii maga aè nduë de äaara sië jag mono. AÈ joñ ra äuy diñ de boo biñni de see äe tawa.

Francais: Il fit le chandelier d'or pur ; il fit d'or battu le chandelier, avec son pied et sa tige; ses calices, ses boutons et ses fleurs étaient d'une même pièce.
Anglais: And he made the candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work made he the candlestick; his shaft, and his branch, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, were of the same:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam kot va ma tun fitilla hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna; nam kot va ma tun fitilla hiɗi or ma tayayna; selem ma gaana, zokomu, yalamu, gaslamu hiɗi ɓalamu, nam tapay kulo tam tuwamu.
Bulu: A nga bo ébi bifufub a mvot ane mfuban a too mbiban; abo, nkuk, bilaé, bibuma a mesam mé bi too mboon jôme jia.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Besalel a vuɗ li ɗuva lampe ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ: sar naŋ, ganday naŋ, taasa naŋ, li wus naŋ waɗ gwat misi ka mufuyuk naŋ gar na, i muvuɗa simbirlim ar li purla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi tappaandi. O waɗi ɗum bee kuugal tappoowo, jooɗorɗum bee dubbeere e taasahoy e morle e pinndi haa maajum fuu. Ɗum fuu ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi tappaandi. O waɗi ɗum bee kuugal tappoowo, jooɗorɗum bee dubbeere e taasahoy e morle e pinndi haa maajum fuu. Ɗum fuu ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Besalɛl dee  dek-e-wee  nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr; a̧ duia  dek-e-wee , naŋ-a in gun-aa, o be yee kɔ̧ a̧, o kpoi-a in o dap-aa nɛ ya kpɔk in a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Besalɛl dee  dek-e-wee  nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr; a̧ duia  dek-e-wee , naŋ-a in gun-aa, o be yee kɔ̧ a̧, o kpoi-a in o dap-aa nɛ ya kpɔk in a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Bɛsalɛl vɛsəte wəsə kentare yɛ paterela le mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe. Kanya kwetɛŋe ŋkɛ le seɗa ta ŋkɛ, yɛ dzeve ta ŋkɛ, yɛ wəbəzlia n'yi nyi te, kweci wəshia ŋkɛ nyi tehwepərə tehwepərə ba'a kweci wəshia ŋkɛ nyi kala ghwə ta wəfe.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ mo ma heer lampan de boo biñni de see äe tawa. AÀ joñn de boo biñni ma de tooge, äaale äe, koo äe no, huçy äen wo no, horloñ äe ma do le'ge amañden wo no, de fuëgi äen wo äuy wo de jagge jag keçeç.

Francais: Six branches sortaient de ses côtés; trois branches du chandelier de l'un de ses côtés, et trois branches du chandelier du second de ses côtés.
Anglais: And six branches going out of the sides thereof; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side thereof, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side thereof:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓalam karkiya kali goy talam pa, ɓalam ma ɦidina kali goy hay galam hena, ɓalam hen ma ɦidina kali goy hay galam hen pa kaw.
Bulu: Ebi bifufub te é bili mintyaé misaman, milal éfase ji milale mivok éfase ji.
Guiziga: Mihaŋ ava ɓaˀ ɓaˀ merkeɗ, a zlo kasl avu ganday naŋ ngi wuzla tuwa, ɓaˀ ɓaˀ makir ti ka, makir ti ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lice joweego ngurti haa buttuli maajum, lice jo'inirɗum tati haa wuttudu ndu'u, non boo lice tati haa wuttudu nduya.
Fulfulde_DC: Lice joweego ngurti haa buttuli maajum, lice jo'inirɗum tati haa wuttudu ndu'u, non boo lice tati haa wuttudu nduya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbaa-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, taar a̧ra̧ si mgbɔɔr, taar si mgbɔɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbaa-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, taar a̧ra̧ si mgbɔɔr, taar si mgbɔɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Dzeve ŋkwaŋe ya te seɗa ta ŋkɛ, mahekene laka nya bela, mahekene laka nya.
Tupurri: Jag do äe ma hiira'n hay wo jag kaçaçra, äañla swa' lay, äañla swa' lay.

Francais: Il y avait sur la première branche trois calices en fleurs d'amandier, bouton et fleur, et sur la seconde branche trois calices en fleurs d'amandiers, bouton et fleur; il en était de même pour les six branches partant du chandelier.
Anglais: Three bowls made after the fashion of almonds in one branch, a knop and a flower; and three bowls made like almonds in another branch, a knop and a flower: so throughout the six branches going out of the candlestick.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay ɓalam ma kepna yalam ma kulon moki ki vuɗna vi moŋgon nala, gaslam hiɗi ɓalam ka'a, ma hena kaw ay nala. Ɓalam karkiya kaf ma kal ay goy talam pan kayni nam ay ki kayn nala.
Bulu: Ntyaé ôse ô bili bilaé bilaa éyekaʼa ane ébuma mvin, bibuma a mesam me too été; mintyaé misaman mise mi nga tii ébi bifufup mi mbe avale te.
Guiziga: Angi mihaŋ naŋ ɓaˀ purla gar na, sikiɗ mipitikay pitikay makir, ti li wus naŋhay waɗ gwat naŋhay, misi ka mufuyuku.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Taasahoy tatoy bana ɓiɓɓe lawjahi haa lisal gootal bee morlere e pinndiri. Non boo taasahoy tatoy bana ɓiɓɓe lawjahi haa lisal ɗiɗaɓal, bee morlere e pinndiri, bana non lice joweego fuu gurtotooɗe haa jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Taasahoy tatoy bana ɓiɓɓe lawjahi haa lisal gootal bee morlere e pinndiri. Non boo taasahoy tatoy bana ɓiɓɓe lawjahi haa lisal ɗiɗaɓal, bee morlere e pinndiri, bana non lice joweego fuu gurtotooɗe haa jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ gbaa-er-a kpɔk, a̧ dee o be-yee taar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ o kpoi-a, in o dap-aa. Ɓɛɛ tɛ yiitoo gbaa-er-a, a̧ dee o be-yee taar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ o kpoi-a in o dap-aa, hegɔ dam nɛ o gbaa-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ gbaa-er-a kpɔk, a̧ dee o be-yee taar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ o kpoi-a, in o dap-aa. Ɓɛɛ tɛ yiitoo gbaa-er-a, a̧ dee o be-yee taar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ o kpoi-a in o dap-aa, hegɔ dam nɛ o gbaa-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te yayata dzeve ne, wəbəzli nyi kala ya ta vegeme ya shɛ mahekene, kweci wəshi tehwepərə tehwepərə ba'a kweci wəshi kala ghwə ta wəfe ya te hɛ.
Tupurri: Ti jag do äe boñ mono, huçy äe hay de toçëge ni swa'a, horloñ äe ma do amañde no, de fuëgi äen wo no, aà hay go ti jag do mo ma heer lampa ma renamn wo desen no äuy no.

Francais: A la tige du chandelier, il y avait quatre calices, en fleurs d'amandier, avec leurs boutons et leurs fleurs.
Anglais: And in the candlestick were four bowls made like almonds, his knops, and his flowers:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay zok va ma tun fitilla, yalam ma moki ki vuɗna vi moŋgon nalan ka fiɗi, gaslam ka'a, ɓalam ka'a kaw.
Bulu: Nkuʼu ébi bifufub ô nga bili bilaé binyin éyekaʼa ane ébuma mvin, bibuma a mesam me too été.
Guiziga: Ar ganday naŋ ngi wuzla, sikiɗ mipitikay pitikay mufaɗa, ti li wus naŋhay ati gwat naŋhay, misi kaɓa mufuyuku.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa dubbeere jo'inirɗum boo, taasahoy nayoy bana ɓiɓɓe lawjahi bee morle maare e pinndi maare.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa dubbeere jo'inirɗum boo, taasahoy nayoy bana ɓiɓɓe lawjahi bee morle maare e pinndi maare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kiitɛ  dek-e-wee ‘i a̧a̧ nɛ be yee naar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ kpoi-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ in o dap-aa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kiitɛ  dek-e-wee ‘i a̧a̧ nɛ be yee naar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ kpoi-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ in o dap-aa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te dəŋwə ne, wəbəzli nyi kala ya ta vegeme ya shɛ wəfaɗe, kweci wəshi tehwepərə tehwepərə ba'a kweci wəshi kala ghwə ta wəfe ya te hɛ.
Tupurri: See koo mo ma heer lampan mono, huçy äe hay ni naa, de horloñ äaara ma do le'ge amande no.

Francais: Il y avait un bouton sous les deux premières branches partant de la tige du chandelier, un bouton sous les deux branches suivantes partant de la tige du chandelier, et un bouton sous les deux dernières branches partant de la tige du chandelier, selon les six branches sortant du chandelier.
Anglais: And a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches going out of it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓalam ma kali goy hay tuwam pana gaslna ka mokay gaa kuɗumu, gaslna ka gaa kuɗ hen ma ma'na, hen ma ma'n lo, nam noŋ kaf ay ki kayn nala.
Bulu: Mintyaé misaman mi nga beme nkuk ébi bifufub mi mbe mbaʼatan mibaé mibaé, ébuma é too mbaʼatan ôse si.
Guiziga: Mihaŋ naŋhay mujumom cuw cuw ng'avi ganday ngi wuzla na, asi virzi taŋ, li wus naŋ ada gara ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Morlere woore les lice maare ɗiɗi, kadiboo morlere woore les lice maare ɗiɗi, fahin morlere woore les lice maare ɗiɗi, ngam lice joweego gurtotooɗe haa jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Morlere woore les lice maare ɗiɗi, kadiboo morlere woore les lice maare ɗiɗi, fahin morlere woore les lice maare ɗiɗi, ngam lice joweego gurtotooɗe haa jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yuwar-a duka hee mɔ'ɔ ga: kpoi-a kpɔk duk ɗɔɔ kuti gbaa-er  dek-e-wee  yiitoo; nɛ́ kalemɔ‘i à̧ dea wen o gbaa-er-a yiitoo yiitoo dam wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk'i lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yuwar-a duka hee mɔ'ɔ ga: kpoi-a kpɔk duk ɗɔɔ kuti gbaa-er  dek-e-wee  yiitoo; nɛ́ kalemɔ‘i à̧ dea wen o gbaa-er-a yiitoo yiitoo dam wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk'i lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwayite ta yayata jikə ta dzeve nyi keslə bake nyi, bake nyi mahekene zhigə te dəŋwə: kwete wəsə ya shɛ tehwepərə.
Tupurri: Jag do äe ma po wo äog maga laa wo go see mo ma heer lampan hay wo de äod horloñ were. Wer ma la dosen no lay, wer ma la dosen no lay, haçaç go wer äaara hiira' äuy.

Francais: Ces boutons et ces branches étaient d'une même pièce avec le chandelier; le tout était une masse d'or battu, d'or pur.
Anglais: Their knops and their branches were of the same: all of it was one beaten work of pure gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gaslna hiɗi ɓam va ma tun fitilla tapay kulo tam tuwamu, nam kaf ay kotay hiɗi or ma tayayna hiɗi ma bay-rigasna.
Bulu: Bibuma a mintyaé mi ébi bifufub bi too jôme jia; ase mboon a mvot a ne mbiban a mfuban .
Guiziga: Li wus naŋhay ati haŋ naŋhay gar na, i muvuɗa ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, sumburlum arleˀe ati mekelemeye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Morle e lice e jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji fuu laati kuuwaaɗum gootum, ɗum kaŋŋeeri tappaandi laaɓndi.
Fulfulde_DC: Morle e lice e jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji fuu laati kuuwaaɗum gootum, ɗum kaŋŋeeri tappaandi laaɓndi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O kpoi-a in o gbaa-er-a ndaɗa ŋmaa kpɔk in kiitɛ-a; a̧ mboɗa wa dui kpɔk nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O kpoi-a in o gbaa-er-a ndaɗa ŋmaa kpɔk in kiitɛ-a; a̧ mboɗa wa dui kpɔk nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəshi nyi tehwepərə tehwepərə nyi ba'a yɛ dzeve ne, kanya kwetɛŋe hɛ le wəshi nyi ketene, pɛtɛ hɛ le mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe.
Tupurri: Horloñ äen hay wo go de jag nen äiñ kaçaçra äuy de mo ma heer lampa no. AÀ hay wo äuy de tooge de boo biñni de see tawa.

Francais: Il fit ses lampes au nombre de sept, ses mouchettes et ses vases à cendre, en or pur.
Anglais: And he made his seven lamps, and his snuffers, and his snuffdishes, of pure gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot fitil ma siɗiyana, sle ma do kuta, hiɗi ŋarak ma ko butuwn hayna, kotom kaf hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna.
Bulu: Belambe bé zamgbwa, menjo mé a bikutan asup bié bi too mboon a mvot a ne mfuban .
Guiziga: Besalel a vuɗ lampehey tarnaˀ, waɗ gwat ngi slrahay, i macamayay ati gwat ngi tiɓa fucu, cek i muvuɗa taŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi pittirlaaji maajum joweeɗiɗi e mekefje maajum e taasahoy ndoondi maajum fuu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi pittirlaaji maajum joweeɗiɗi e mekefje maajum e taasahoy ndoondi maajum fuu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o lamba mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a sɛnɛ, gu nɛ o mɔɔ-ɓam-mɔ in o nyɛk-a-bùk, lɛŋ nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o lamba mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a sɛnɛ, gu nɛ o mɔɔ-ɓam-mɔ in o nyɛk-a-bùk, lɛŋ nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte paterela mberefaŋe, tsagha yɛ mekese ba'a wəshi kefə pəsəɗə le mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ lampa äe ma renamn wo de äogam ma tagge äen wo, de gesaçaçge ma yaçë saçaçge äen wo de boo biñni de see äe tawa.

Francais: On employa un talent d'or pur pour faire le chandelier avec tous ses ustensiles.
Anglais: Of a talent of pure gold made he it, and all the vessels thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yaw or ma bay-rigasna ir kilo dok-ɦidi, kay li va ma tun fitilla hiɗi jak ma talamna.
Bulu: Be nga belan bekiligram be mvot a ne mfuban mewôm mela mfaʼa ya kôme ébi bifufub a biôm mebelan bié bise.
Guiziga: A tikam ngi ɗiya li ɗuva lampe ati gwat ngi slraˀahaya, ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ kilo kukur makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kuuwruɗe maajum fuu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi baakin kilo cappanɗe tati.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kuuwruɗe maajum fuu bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi baakin kilo cappanɗe tati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ baa nɛ kilo fuu lɔr ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ de nɛ  dek-e-wee  in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ baa nɛ kilo fuu lɔr ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ de nɛ  dek-e-wee  in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha vɛsə wəsə kentare yɛ paterela, yɛ mekese ba'a wəshi kefə pəsəɗə ne, kiləwəa mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe mahekenemsə yamenehwe slene mbeli le.
Tupurri: Mo ma heer lampan de feçeçre joñre äen wo äuy mo deñ ree wo boo biñni de see äe tawa nen mañ klew do swa'a.

Francais: Il fit l'autel des parfums de bois d'acacia ; sa longueur était d'ente coudée, et sa largeur d'une coudée; il était carré, et sa hauteur était de deux coudées; ses cornes faisaient corps avec lui.
Anglais: And he made the incense altar of shittim wood: the length of it was a cubit, and the breadth of it a cubit; it was foursquare; and two cubits was the height of it; the horns thereof were of the same.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma ŋal urdin kulo kalamna, nam kotom hiɗi gu-kasiyana; fiyokka valamu ir goldoŋ kep, be'da valamu ir goldoŋ kep; gefem fiɗi pet ŋray ca, fiyokka valamu ir goldoŋ ma', miyokŋa ka kal goyo hay gef giwin-ma-ɗifinna.
Bulu: Ane a nga lôñe ataʼa metunaʼa bʼôlobinda a asé; nté ô too anyiʼi wo da, ndam fe anyiʼi wo da; ataʼa metunaʼa ate a mbe abime da nté a ndam, ve ôyabe yôp ô mbe menyiʼi me mo mela. A nga futi minlak mekuʼu menyin; minlak a ataʼa metunaʼa bi too jôm jia.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, ɓa ngi zluma urdi na, Besalel a ɗiyi li gi mikuli ti dum ngi ngalalay, jek naŋ ati sliprik naŋ i misi purla, saŋtimetir kukur zlum kukur zlum, yo gil naŋ metir pal. Mivay naŋhay mufaɗ taŋ yoŋ yoŋ kaɓa durum, sumburlum jom ati li gi mikuli vuna si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi gulduɗum uurle bee leggal gawaral. Njuutirka maajum reeta meetir, njaajirka maajum boo reeta meetir, waato tolɗi nayi potanɗi, towirka maajum boo meetir gootel. Ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee luwe maajum.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi gulduɗum uurle bee leggal gawaral. Njuutirka maajum reeta meetir, njaajirka maajum boo reeta meetir, waato tolɗi nayi potanɗi, towirka maajum boo meetir gootel. Ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee luwe maajum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ te akasia; dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛma ŋmaa tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a duk nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk. Ɓɛɛ o zak ká̧ a̧ duk kpɔk in a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ te akasia; dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛma ŋmaa tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a duk nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk. Ɓɛɛ o zak ká̧ a̧ duk kpɔk in a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, pa Bɛsalɛl baŋete reghwetɛ ketere 'wərdə yitea sheghwəa gwevɛre. Yipə yipə yɛ biya ta reghwetɛa shɛ le bezlea ŋkɛ, kadzeghe kwetɛŋe slə yitea fegwele hwa'a mɛa ŋwalea dzeve yayata bela ta ŋkɛ ba'a dzeghe bake dzeme ghweme ta ŋkɛ. Jikə tereme nyi te yɛ sleme ta ŋkɛ le.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ ngeel sië jag feçeçre foçoçren de koo gasiya. Depaçaçge äen hay wo go dega'dega' äuy. AÀ ngaä sañtimeder do dwee. Geçeçre äe ciñ nen ngaä meder äoñ. AÀ hay de coçoç ti.

Francais: Il le revêtit d'or pur, le dessus, les côtés tout autour et les cornes, et il y fit une guirlande d'or tout autour.
Anglais: And he overlaid it with pure gold, both the top of it, and the sides thereof round about, and the horns of it: also he made unto it a crown of gold round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam korom tuwam hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna: Yalam ma kulona, galam noŋ kafe, hiɗi miyokŋa, nam korom gaŋam hiɗi or noŋ kafe.
Bulu: A nga yañe nye a mvot a ne mfuban mfaʼa ya yôp, e mefefel, mbômaʼane a minlak, ane fe a nga bo nkôngô mvot mbômaʼan.
Guiziga: A sirta ngbulum wãˀ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, hirnga naŋ, mivay naŋhay muyoŋ yoŋ tuwa, waɗ cakay naŋhay mufaɗ taŋ gar, a kaŋ teŋ gunno ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O suddi ɗum bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, dow maajum e buttuli maajum e luwe maajum fuu. O taarni sera maajum bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O suddi ɗum bee kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, dow maajum e buttuli maajum e luwe maajum fuu. O taarni sera maajum bee fawne kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧a̧ lɔr ɗoŋ-aa in kɔ̧ a̧ pii tɛ o zak nɔ‘i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓo ŋma lɔr nɛ nú-a hegɔɔ zik kpa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧a̧ lɔr ɗoŋ-aa in kɔ̧ a̧ pii tɛ o zak nɔ‘i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓo ŋma lɔr nɛ nú-a hegɔɔ zik kpa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ fiaghe pɛtɛa mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe: ŋkwa nya te, tereme nyi te yɛ sleme ta ŋkɛ, bela ta ŋkɛ nyi wəfaɗe. Pa ŋkɛ menete ŋkwa nya dzeyi mɛa mɛa ŋkɛ dzasle le mze kwa tere tere.
Tupurri: AÈ äo' boo biñni go de see äe tawa ne hen ti. Ti äe, ti jeñ äen wo, see äe äuy, ti coçoç äen wo. AÀ äo' diñdiñ po go ti äe degarra äuy.

Francais: Il fit pour lui deux anneaux d'or, au-dessous de sa guirlande, sur ses deux arêtes ; il les fit aux deux côtés, pour recevoir les barres qui servaient à le porter.
Anglais: And he made two rings of gold for it under the crown thereof, by the two corners of it, upon the two sides thereof, to be places for the staves to bear it withal.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gaa kuɗ gaŋamu nam lak girliŋ-ora hay gal hen ma', hay gal hen ma' lay, kay kal malla ma ziyim hiɗi namna haya.
Bulu: A nga bo bilondo bibaé e nkôngô mvot si éfase ya li a li, a futi fe bilondo mevôme mevok mfaʼa ya some mimbôñ ya beʼe ataʼa metunaʼa.
Guiziga: A ɗiyaŋ ɓalaŋhay cuw ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl, a nga taŋ ti ka ti ka, tisi virzi ngi teŋ naŋ tuwa, ɓa a caka ɓeɓele ngi zuɓ naŋ ar taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi ngam maajum kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri ɗiɗi les fawne sera maajum. O waɗi ɗe haa buttuli maajum ɗiɗi, ɗe njogo cabbi ngam roondaago ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi ngam maajum kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri ɗiɗi les fawne sera maajum. O waɗi ɗe haa buttuli maajum ɗiɗi, ɗe njogo cabbi ngam roondaago ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ duia o kana lɔr e ká̧ nu fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama'i nɛ mgbɔɔr nɛ mgbɔɔr, wen aa o te gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ duia o kana lɔr e ká̧ nu fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama'i nɛ mgbɔɔr nɛ mgbɔɔr, wen aa o te gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte yɛ takase mze kwa tere tere ba'a pa beteyi hɛ bake laka nya, bake laka nya bela ta reghwetɛ, kwayite ta ŋkwa nya dzeyi mɛa mɛa ŋkɛ. Mbe hɛ teha geta nyi tekele mbeli te mbeli.
Tupurri: Ti jag ëiñëiñ äen mo ti' aà heer boo ma delel delel do äeege wer äe äañla äog lay, äañla äog lay. Nen maga koore ma lamma lamman mo heer wo ni ma soëge äe.

Francais: Il fit les barres de bois d'acacia et les revêtit d'or.
Anglais: And he made the staves of shittim wood, and overlaid them with gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot malla hiɗi gu-kasiyana, korom tuwam hiɗi ora.
Bulu: Nde a nga kôme mimbôñ mite a asé a dube mie a mvot.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓeɓele ngi ngalalayay cuw, a kuro taŋ ɓiri tapasl tapasl sirit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o te-gɔa-a nɔ‘i nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ lɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o te-gɔa-a nɔ‘i nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ lɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ feɗete geta bake yitea gwevɛre ba'a fiaghe mze kwa tere tere kənəa hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ koore ma lamma lamman wo de koo gasiya, äo' boo biñni go ne hara ti.

Francais: Il fit l'huile pour l'onction sainte, et le parfum pour l'encensement, composé selon l'art du parfumeur.
Anglais: And he made the holy anointing oil, and the pure incense of sweet spices, according to the work of the apothecary.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot mul ma peldetna ma ɦok kamna, hiɗi urdin ma his fayna, bay gese. Kotom kayni mi sa ma wi yal kotta vi urdina.
Bulu: Ane a nga kôme fe mbon ô ne étyi ba woʼo bôt éyoñ ba telé be bito, nalé fe ôlobinda a nyume mvaé, a too mfuban , nkôman avale ntyetyeñ nkôm be ôlobinda a ne kôm.
Guiziga: Midi urdi, a di mal mipal naŋ ngi vula slra, waɗ urdi pal naŋ mazlumaka ar li gi mikuli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi nebbam cenirɗam e baɗoowo uurle boo waɗi uureteeɗum laaɓɗum .
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi nebbam cenirɗam e baɗoowo uurle boo waɗi uureteeɗum laaɓɗum .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa sa̧a̧-nɔ̧́, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛr fuu-nyama wen dɔa-a; mɔ‘i nɛ tom ko wi-de-nyama.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa sa̧a̧-nɔ̧́, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛr fuu-nyama wen dɔa-a; mɔ‘i nɛ tom ko wi-de-nyama.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa nde ta 'wərdə takɛ n'yi keve ŋkwa tekeleke, tsagha 'wərdə ganyɛ kezha tere te reghwetɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ noo ma kagge ti ma bay ëagn wo de trusa ma foçoçren go yegyege, tay nen äe diñ jar ko joñre trusan wo tu.

Francais: A ses quatre coins, il fit des cornes qui sortaient de l'autel, et il le revêtit d'airain.
Anglais: And he made the horns thereof on the four corners of it; the horns thereof were of the same: and he overlaid it with brass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gefem ma fiɗina, nam kot miyokŋa kulo'o, nam korom tuwam hiɗi wayna.
Bulu: A nga kôme minlak e mekuʼu menyin; minlak a ataʼa metunaʼa bi too jôme jia; ane a nga dube nye a mvot.
Guiziga: Mivay naŋ vay muŋhoyo, mufaɗ taŋ yoŋ yoŋ kaɓa durum, sumburlum jom ati li gi mikuli vuna si. A puyakaŋ ɓiri gaza sirit wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi luwe haa coɓɓuli maare nayi, luwe man laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee hirsirde. O suddi nde bee njamndi mboɗeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi luwe haa coɓɓuli maare nayi, luwe man laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee hirsirde. O suddi nde bee njamndi mboɗeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa o zak dam mgbii-aa naar, nɛ yaa ndaɗi ŋmaa in fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ndɛrɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa o zak dam mgbii-aa naar, nɛ yaa ndaɗi ŋmaa in fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ndɛrɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ meneyi yɛ tereme te megwekwe ta ŋkɛ nyi wəfaɗe nyi, kanya kwetɛŋe teremea shɛhɛ le reghwetɛa shɛ. Pa ŋkɛ fikɛ hɛ le mze kwa ghwə ghwə.
Tupurri: Ti coçoç äen wo naa äuy, aè kal cor coçoç go ne hen ti ka' ka'a, äo' boo dob go ne hen ti.

Francais: Il fit tous les ustensiles de l'autel, les vases à cendre, les pelles, les bassins, les fourchettes et les brasiers; il fit d'airain tous ces ustensiles.
Anglais: And he made all the vessels of the altar, the pots, and the shovels, and the basins, and the fleshhooks, and the firepans: all the vessels thereof made he of brass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot jak ma li lop hay giwin-ma-ɗifinna noŋ kaf, ŋarakŋa ma ko butuw-kuna, pella, tasa ma ŋulona, va ma yaw sliwna, kot ganuna kaw; sle namna kaf nam kotom hiɗi wayna.
Bulu: A nga bo biôm mebelan bise ya ataʼa metunaʼa: Bisobelé, bilaé, bilum, bikutan asup a meviek, a nga bo bise a mvot.
Guiziga: Gazlanga magam taŋ slra ar li gi mikuli gar: taasa ngi hila fucuhoy, peley, gwat ngi kuca lihey, furset ngi zliga useˀhey waɗ li zluma urdihey cek na, i mipa ti ɓiri gazahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kuuje hirsirde fuu: Payanɗe e ɓoftirɗe e pehe biccirɗe ƴiiƴam e tufirɗe e pehe gulduɗe. O waɗi ɗe fuu bee njamndi mboɗeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kuuje hirsirde fuu: Payanɗe e ɓoftirɗe e pehe biccirɗe ƴiiƴam e tufirɗe e pehe gulduɗe. O waɗi ɗe fuu bee njamndi mboɗeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ duia o nyɛk lɛŋ wen  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ : o yee, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o pɛsa tasi, o boi-kɔk-mɔ in tasi-aŋ-wee; a̧ duia o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ duia o nyɛk lɛŋ wen  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ : o yee, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o pɛsa tasi, o boi-kɔk-mɔ in tasi-aŋ-wee; a̧ duia o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte wəshi kemene slene te reghwetɛ pɛtɛ le mze kwa ghwə ghwə: wəshi kefə pəsəɗə, yɛ pɛlə, yɛ kwenə kesheke mimi, wəshi kezhɛre sli te ghwə ba'a wəshi ketere 'wərdə.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ feçeçre joñre ma ti ngeel sië jagn wo ni äuy. Joñ pel äen wo, gesaçaçge äen wo, feçeçre ma yaçë saçaçge äen wo, fursed äen wo, de swee äen wo. AÈ joñ feçeçre joñre sen wo mo deñ äuy de boo dobe.

Francais: Il fit à l'autel une grille d'airain en forme de treillis; il la plaça sous la corniche de l'autel, par en bas, jusqu'à moitié de la hauteur.
Anglais: And he made for the altar a brasen grate of network under the compass thereof beneath unto the midst of it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam cil wayna ki dena nala, nam cum gaa kuɗ gaŋ giwin-ma-ɗifinna, hay gal ma gaana, ta-ta kulo hoyokomu.
Bulu: Ane a nga bo étañ jʼabeʼe nduan, a nga bo je a mvot, é too nkôñ wo bôman ataʼa metunaʼa si a kui ézezañe ya ataʼa metunaʼa.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi griyaz ti ɓiri gaza, a dira gunno avu li gi mikuli, zle a ruwuyo hã a didak naŋ, tisi virzi ngi teŋ naŋ tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗani hirsirde kuuwaaɗum jamɗe boɗeeje gaafiiɗe, nannduɗum bee zubaawol, les taarnaaɗum maare, ɗum yotti reeta towirka maare.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗani hirsirde kuuwaaɗum jamɗe boɗeeje gaafiiɗe, nannduɗum bee zubaawol, les taarnaaɗum maare, ɗum yotti reeta towirka maare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ sina ŋma be háŋányáŋá-mɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ e mgbák ká̧ nu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  nɛ ɗɔɔ si ŋgɔn mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ sina ŋma be háŋányáŋá-mɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ e mgbák ká̧ nu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  nɛ ɗɔɔ si ŋgɔn mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte kwete wəsə kala lɛ kepesa sli le mze kwa ghwə ghwə, pa meneyite dzeyi yitea reghwetɛ, ghala slə nde te hɛɗi hwa'a mbe tepe ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ boo ma nen yraçaçraçaç de boo dob ti ngeel sië jagn ni, kaln le wer gesiñ ti jeñ äe ma diñdiñ no, haçaç go yoo äe ti geçeçre äen dega'dega'a.

Francais: Il fondit quatre anneaux, qu'il mit aux quatre coins de la grille d'airain, pour recevoir les barres.
Anglais: And he cast four rings for the four ends of the grate of brass, to be places for the staves.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yor girliŋ fiɗi, nam lakam goy hay gef ma fiɗina vi kaway-ciliyna, kay kal malla hayamu.
Bulu: Ane a nga nyemene bilondo binyin a futi bie mekuʼu menyin ya étañ mvote si mfaʼa ya some mimbôñ.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓalaŋhay mufaɗ, a nga taŋ a mivay ngi griyaz ngi ɓiri gaza tuwa mufaɗ taŋ, ɓa ngi ci ɓeɓele ar taŋ ngi zuɓ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalagaaje nayi haa seɓattooji kuuwaaɗum jamɗe boɗeeje gaafiiɗe go, ngam jogaago cabbi.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalagaaje nayi haa seɓattooji kuuwaaɗum jamɗe boɗeeje gaafiiɗe go, ngam jogaago cabbi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi o kana a nɛ mgbii-aa naar wen pi̧i̧ te gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi o kana a nɛ mgbii-aa naar wen pi̧i̧ te gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vɛsəte takase wəfaɗe kezha ve hɛ te megwekwe nyi wəfaɗe te wəsə nya kala lɛ kepesa sli nya le mze kwa ghwə ghwə, kezha ha geta jive mbe hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ yor boo ma delel delel do äeege naa, heer ra ti coçoç boo dob ma nen yraçaçraçaçn naa äuy, ma heer jag koore ma lamma lamman wo no.

Francais: Il fit les barres de bois d'acacia et les revêtit d'airain.
Anglais: And he made the staves of shittim wood, and overlaid them with brass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot malla hiɗi gu-kasiyana, korom tuwam hiɗi wayna.
Bulu: A nga kôme mimbôñ a asé a dube mie a mvot.
Guiziga: A ɗiyi ɓeɓele ngi ngalalayay cuw, a kuro taŋ ɓiri gaza sirit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee njamndi mboɗeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi cabbi leggal gawaral, o suddi ɗi bee njamndi mboɗeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ndɛrɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ndɛrɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ feɗete geta bake yitea gwevɛre ba'a fiaghe mze kwa ghwə ghwə kənəa hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ koore ma lamma lamman wo de koo gasiya, kal äo' boo dob go ne hara ti.

Francais: Il passa les barres dans les anneaux, aux côtés de l'autel, pour qu'elles servent à le transporter. Il le fit creux, en planches.
Anglais: And he put the staves into the rings on the sides of the altar, to bear it withal; he made the altar hollow with boards.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kal malla hay girliŋŋa ma ka ciy goy gaŋ giwin-ma-ɗifinna, kay ziyim hiɗi namu. Nam kotom hayam gaa zulu, hiɗi biremna.
Bulu: Ane nga some mimbôñ ya beʼe ataʼa metunaʼa e bilondo; a ataʼa metunaʼa e mbe nlôñan a mebam ve a too mfulemfu mfaʼa ya été.
Guiziga: A ca taŋ ar ɓalaŋhay misi ar cakay ngi li gi mikuli tuwa, ɓa ngi zuɓ naŋ. Li gi mikuli miɗiya ti dum nah, huroˀo njoŋ kine.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nastini cabbi man nder kalagaaje haa buttuli hirsirde ngam roondaago nde. O waɗi nde bee kaataakooje, walaa koo ɗume nder maare.
Fulfulde_DC: O nastini cabbi man nder kalagaaje haa buttuli hirsirde ngam roondaago nde. O waɗi nde bee kaataakooje, walaa koo ɗume nder maare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ yura o te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ o kana nɛ duk ká̧  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  wen gɔa-a; a̧ ɗafa  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  nɛ te, nɛ kɔ̧ a̧ duk ɓuɗuk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ yura o te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ o kana nɛ duk ká̧  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  wen gɔa-a; a̧ ɗafa  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  nɛ te, nɛ kɔ̧ a̧ duk ɓuɗuk.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ hehame hɛ mbe takase nyi dzeyi vare yɛ bela ta reghwetɛ nyi bake kezha kele te. Ma reghwetɛ nya baŋete nya mbeli le sheghwə nyi slapesla slapesla ne, ghwəarara ŋkwa nya kwa hwəa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal heer rage äil boore ma delel delel do äeege ma jeñ ngeel sië jag no, ga wo diñ ma soëge äe mono. AÈ joñn de rum äili, de plañse.

Francais: Il fit la cuve et sa base d'airain, avec les miroirs des femmes qui s'assemblaient à l'entrée de la tente de réunion.
Anglais: And he made the laver of brass, and the foot of it of brass, of the lookingglasses of the women assembling, which assembled at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot doway-firina ma kawayna, diram ma tuni gaan yori kawaya, nam kotom tuwam hiɗi daraŋgalla vi boyna sa ka tok tuwsiya hay vun guɗuk ma fi-tuwna.
Bulu: A nga belane bengobé be binga be mbe be sulaʼan anyiine nda éndélé bisulan mfaʼa ya kôme fandé mvot a tine mvote jé.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Besalel a ɗiyi kisa, a pa ti ɓiri gaza, yo li ɗuv naŋhaya ti ɓiri gaza ma, a ɗiya ti dorogal ngi ɓiri gaza ngi ngwasay magam slra a mizlingre guɗuk ngi zlir ati Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi daaro njamndi mboɗeeri e jo'inirɗum maago ɗum njamndi mboɗeeri. O waɗi ngo bee njamndi e daarorɗe rewɓe huuwooɓe haa dammugal laymaaru fottirde .
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi daaro njamndi mboɗeeri e jo'inirɗum maago ɗum njamndi mboɗeeri. O waɗi ngo bee njamndi e daarorɗe rewɓe huuwooɓe haa dammugal laymaaru fottirde .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee kpáná-ndɛrɛ in gun-aa nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ kaia nɛ o mɔɔ-zɔk-yí ko okoo nɛ de tom sɛn nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa de nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee kpáná-ndɛrɛ in gun-aa nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ kaia nɛ o mɔɔ-zɔk-yí ko okoo nɛ de tom sɛn nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa de nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, pa Bɛsalɛl vɛsəte kwenə yitea mze kwa ghwə ghwə, tsagha wəsə nya ntare mbeli te le mze kwa ghwə ghwə. Le deraŋgalea mi nyi kemene slene mɛa mɛa ŋkwa kedzembe cɛ lekwesa kebegeme geva menete hɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ gesaçaçge ma de boo dob no, de glog äe ma de boo dob no. AÀ joñn de fenkonen ma naare maga tay wo jag tiñ Tiñ Yiñgi de Baan mono.

Francais: Il fit le parvis. Du côté du midi, à droite, les rideaux du parvis, en lin retors, avaient une longueur de cent coudées,
Anglais: And he made the court: on the south side southward the hangings of the court were of fine twined linen, an hundred cubits:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kot wur-daŋŋa, hay gal ma kayamna, kay kot wur-daŋŋa kayni: Nisi gar sligar-gaɓayna hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna, fiyokka valamu ir goldoŋ kis.
Bulu: A nga bo fe nseñ. Mfaʼa ya nké a nga belan bifumulu biyé ntiñan nté tañe menyiʼi me mo ntet,
Guiziga: Wazlaray ada gun gun a hirnga guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ, maakway ngi wazlaraya, a slaka ti zana magam di wuya avu dalam, mija ti gugumay mislirkeɗ. Tir vay ruwuyo, jek ngi zana, metir kukur zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi daldal jooɗorde. Haa wuttudu fombina, o waɗi wiirndallooji daldal bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi, meetir cappanɗe jowi,
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi daldal jooɗorde. Haa wuttudu fombina, o waɗi wiirndallooji daldal bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi, meetir cappanɗe jowi,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa nú-zala, in zɔ̧-laa babir-a nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗafa nú-zala, in zɔ̧-laa babir-a nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma dzeyi yitea cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ne, ŋwela ya shɛ. Ma ŋwela shɛ ne, zlave nyi tsate mbeli le pawa nyi berete berete ya kaghala ta ŋkɛ. Ma laka bela kwa zeme ne, mɛtre mcɛfemsə biya ta zlavea shɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ feelen wo nen negef äañ ni Waçybane, hay go de äo'ge ti feelen diñ oçoçbe leçeç ma kefkefe, depaçaçge äen nen ngaä meder do dwee.

Francais: avec vingt colonnes et leurs vingt socles d'airain; les crochets des colonnes et leurs tringles étaient d'argent.
Anglais: Their pillars were twenty, and their brasen sockets twenty; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi dolla dok-ma', ini kulo kay wayn dok-ma'; sle ma gaɓna vi dolla hiɗi zigewna kaf kotay hiɗi doorota.
Bulu: a mekône mab mewôm mebaé a metine me mvot mab mewôm mebaé; akop ya mekôn a ayemaʼa dab bi mbe mboon a silba.
Guiziga: A njiraka avu gwat ngi kilika zana ati ponti ngi ɓiri barahay kaˀ kaˀ avu ɓamtal ngi ɓiri gazahay kukur cuw, yo sivirzi ngi ɓamtalaya kaˀ kaˀ ar ɓiri gazahay kukur cuwo ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: bee daŋraŋge maaru noogas e kosɗe maaje noogas ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri e ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi.
Fulfulde_DC: bee daŋraŋge maaru noogas e kosɗe maaje noogas ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri e ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o mbiŋ-a ɓu-yiitoo in gun-aa ɓu-yiitoo nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ in mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee o mbiŋ-a ɓu-yiitoo in gun-aa ɓu-yiitoo nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ in mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ ndɛaŋe ba'a yɛ geta nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa yandɛaŋete hɛ mbeli le te seləa mze kwa ghwə ghwə nyi bakemsə. Te wəshi kentare nyi bakemsə le mze kwa ghwə ghwə ntarate geva seləa shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: De gefay äaara ma do äog de kañ glog ti kray boo dob wo no. Boore ma äal gefay ma kiñkiñn wo de boore ma heer oçoçben hay wo de joñge diñ de boo solay.

Francais: Du côté du nord, les rideaux avaient cent coudées avec vingt colonnes et leurs vingt socles d'airain; les crochets des colonnes et leurs tringles étaient d'argent.
Anglais: And for the north side the hangings were an hundred cubits, their pillars were twenty, and their sockets of brass twenty; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma gaana sligar ma gaɓayna ir goldoŋ kis ka'a, hiɗi dolla dok-ma', hiɗi kaway ma yorin gaa kuɗum dok-ma'; sle ma gaɓna vi dolla hiɗi zigewna kaf kotay hiɗi doorota.
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya akôé, biyé bi mbe nté tañe menyiʼi me mo ntet a mekôn mewôm mebaé map a metin mewôm mebaé map; akobe dab a ayemaʼa dab bi mbe mboon a silba.
Guiziga: Tir vay muŋ, jek ngi zana, metir kukur zlumo ma. A njiraka taŋ kaɓa numuŋhoy tuwa ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa wuttudu woyla boo meetir cappanɗe jowi, bee daŋraŋge maaru noogas e kosɗe maaje noogas ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri e ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa wuttudu woyla boo meetir cappanɗe jowi, bee daŋraŋge maaru noogas e kosɗe maaje noogas ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri e ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dura babir-laa mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o mbiŋ-a nɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o gun-aa ɓu-yiitoo nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ in o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dura babir-laa mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o mbiŋ-a nɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o gun-aa ɓu-yiitoo nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ in o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka bela kwa gwela ne, mɛtre mcɛfemsə biya ta zlavea shɛ ba'a tsagha shɛ ndɛndɛaŋeyi hɛ mbeli.
Tupurri: Wo nen äañ gloñhweede no kay mo lay no, oçoçbe hay ni nen ngaä meder do dwee, de gefay de boore ma de kray glog de boo dob äaara wo no. Boore ma äal gefay wo de boore ma heer oçoçben hay wo de joñge diñ de boo solay.

Francais: Du côté de l'occident, les rideaux avaient cinquante coudées, avec dix colonnes et leurs dix socles.
