Anglais: And for the west side were hangings of fifty cubits, their pillars ten, and their sockets ten; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma vulatina, sligar-gaɓayna ir goldoŋ dok-vasl, hiɗi dolla doogo, hiɗi diram ma yori gaan doogo kaw, sle ma gaɓna vi dolla hiɗi zigewna kaf kotay hiɗi doorota.
Bulu: Mfaʼa jôp da dim, biyé nté menyiʼi me mo mewôm metan a mekôn awôm map, a metin awôme map; akobe ya mekôn a ayemaʼa dab bi mbe mboon a silba.
Guiziga: Tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, jek ngi zana metir kukur cuw nga zlum, a njiraka taŋ kaɓa numuŋhoy ma, avu ɓamtalay kuruˀ, yo virzi ngi ɓamtalaya i ɓiri gazahay kuruˀ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa wuttudu hiirnaaŋge boo wiirndallooji meetir noogas e jowi, bee daŋraŋge maaru sappo e kosɗe maaje sappo e ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa wuttudu hiirnaaŋge boo wiirndallooji meetir noogas e jowi, bee daŋraŋge maaru sappo e kosɗe maaje sappo e ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dura zɔ̧-laa-kpe-nú-zala nɛ war yee-wese nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ; mbiŋ tɔna-a nɛ ɓu, gun-aa ɓu nɛ bu-mbɔi mbɛt. O boi-kɔk-mɔ in o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ ya tɛ o mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dura zɔ̧-laa-kpe-nú-zala nɛ war yee-wese nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ; mbiŋ tɔna-a nɛ ɓu, gun-aa ɓu nɛ bu-mbɔi mbɛt. O boi-kɔk-mɔ in o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ ya tɛ o mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci ne, mɛtre bakemsə mcɛfeghəmbe bezlea zlavea shɛ. Tsagha ndɛndɛaŋeyi hɛ mbeli te selə meŋe, nyi mentare te wəshi kentare selə meŋe.
Tupurri: Wo nen pel no kay mono, oçoçbe hay ni nen ngaä meder do äog ti dwee, de gefay wo hwal de kray äaara glog de boo dob hwale. Boore ma äal gefay ma kiñkiñn wo de boore ma heer oçoçben hay wo de joñge diñ de boo solay.

Francais: Du côté de l'orient, sur le devant, il y avait cinquante coudées :
Anglais: And for the east side eastward fifty cubits.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma kuɗuwna, jar goldoŋ ma dok-vaslna vi buɗukka valam kayni,
Bulu: Mfaʼa jôb da tôô, biyé bi mbe nté tañe menyiʼi me mo, mewôm metan;
Guiziga: Tivi mizlingreŋ, tisi pas ngi miprike, sliprik ngi wazlaraya, metir kukur cuw nga zlumo ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa wuttudu fuunaaŋge boo meetir noogas e jowi:
Fulfulde_DC: Haa wuttudu fuunaaŋge boo meetir noogas e jowi:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dura babir-laa nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dura babir-laa nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka ŋkwa kedzeki nya laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci ne, mɛtre bakemsə mcɛfeghəmbe bezlea zlavea shɛ.
Tupurri: Wo nen wer no kay mono, oçoçbe ni nen ngaä meder do äog ti diy äe no.

Francais: et il y avait quinze coudées de rideaux pour un côté de la porte, avec trois colonnes et leurs trois socles,
Anglais: The hangings of the one side of the gate were fifteen cubits; their pillars three, and their sockets three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sligar-gaɓayna ma ir goldoŋ doogo yam vasl kay gefem ma kepna; hiɗi dolla ma ɦidina, hiɗi kaway ma yori gaa kuɗumna kaw, lo,
Bulu: afebe da é nga nyoñe biyé tañe menyiʼi me mo awôm a di ôsu, e nga nyoñe éyé nté menyiʼi me mo awôm a metan a mekône melale mab a metine melale map.
Guiziga: Tivi mizlingreŋ, jek ngi zana vay pala, metir tarnaˀ ti reta, ɓamtalaya makir, yo li ngi taŋhay i ɓiri gazahay makir ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wiirndallooji meetir joweeɗiɗi bee reeta haa wakeere woore, bee daŋraŋge maare tati e kosɗe maaje tati.
Fulfulde_DC: Wiirndallooji meetir joweeɗiɗi bee reeta haa wakeere woore, bee daŋraŋge maare tati e kosɗe maaje tati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn ká̧ nu tua nɛ mgbɔɔr dura zɔ̧-laa kpea-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta, mbiŋ tɔna-a taar in gun-aa taar mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn ká̧ nu tua nɛ mgbɔɔr dura zɔ̧-laa kpea-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta, mbiŋ tɔna-a taar in gun-aa taar mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka kwete bela ta ŋkwa kadzeki ne, zlave kamɛtre mberefaŋe ba'a kwete gasle yite, selə mahekene ba'a wəshi kentare selə mahekene ya shɛ.
Tupurri: Ti holañ äe boñ mono, oçoçbe hay ni nen ngaä meder renam de nusi, de gefay swa'a, de kray ma glog äaara ma swa'n wo no.

Francais: et pour le deuxième côté -- d'un côté de la porte du parvis comme de l'autre, -- quinze coudées de rideaux avec trois colonnes et leurs trois socles.
Anglais: And for the other side of the court gate, on this hand and that hand, were hangings of fifteen cubits; their pillars three, and their sockets three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay gefem ma ma'na, ma ŋray goy dig vun wur-daŋŋa, sligar-gaɓayna ka ir goldoŋ doogo yam vasl, dolla ka ɦidi, diram gaa yori ɦidi kaw.
Bulu: Afebe baa, é too zôsôô a di ôsu, é nga nyoñe éyé nté menyiʼi me mo awôm a metan a mekône melale map a metine melale map.
Guiziga: Tir vay numuŋ kanah ma, metir tarnaˀ ti reta, ɓamtalay makir waɗ li ngi taŋhay makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wakeere ndeya boo, waato buttuli dammugal ɗo bee to, wiirndallooji meetir joweeɗiɗi bee reeta, bee daŋraŋge maare tati e kosɗe maaje tati.
Fulfulde_DC: Wakeere ndeya boo, waato buttuli dammugal ɗo bee to, wiirndallooji meetir joweeɗiɗi bee reeta, bee daŋraŋge maare tati e kosɗe maaje tati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɓii ká̧ nu tua, dura zɔ̧-laa kpea-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta, nɛ mbiŋ taar in gun-aa taar mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɓii ká̧ nu tua, dura zɔ̧-laa kpea-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta, nɛ mbiŋ taar in gun-aa taar mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka kwete bela ne, zlave kamɛtre mberefaŋe ba'a kwete gasle yite, selə mahekene ba'a wəshi kentare selə mahekene ya shɛ.
Tupurri: Ti jeñ äe ma de äogn jag tiñn äañlan mo lay no, sen dosen no dega' lay. Ti holañ äe boñ mono oçoçbe hay ni nen ngaä meder renam de nusi, de gefay swa'a, de kray ma glog äaara swa' lay.

Francais: Tous les rideaux formant l'enceinte du parvis étaient de lin retors.
Anglais: All the hangings of the court round about were of fine twined linen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sligar-ma-gaɓayna kaf ma ka kalaf hay wur-daŋŋa, kotay hiɗi baraw-haɓna ma duɓarayna.
Bulu: Biyé bite bise bi mbe mintiñan mi ndombo.
Guiziga: Zana ngi gi wuya da dalamay, minjar njar gun wazlaraya gar na, i gabaga mija ti gugumay mislirkeɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wiirndallooji daldal fuu ɗi gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Wiirndallooji daldal fuu ɗi gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O laa-babir nɛ zika ɗoŋ zala lɛŋ nɛ́ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O laa-babir nɛ zika ɗoŋ zala lɛŋ nɛ́ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa zlave nya dzasle yitea ŋwela shɛ ne, le pawa nyi berete berete tsate mbeli.
Tupurri: OÇoçbe ma de yiñ ti feelen hay wo äuy de joñge de leçeç ma kefkefe.

Francais: Les socles pour les colonnes étaient d'airain, les crochets des colonnes et leurs tringles étaient d'argent, et leurs chapiteaux étaient revêtus d'argent. Toutes les colonnes du parvis étaient reliées par des tringles d'argent.
Anglais: And the sockets for the pillars were of brass; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver; and the overlaying of their chapiters of silver; and all the pillars of the court were filleted with silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dir dolla ma gaana mi wayna, sle ma gaɓna hiɗi zigewna koray hiɗi doorota, yalam ma kulona koray hiɗi doorota. Dolla ma hay wur-daŋŋa kaf zigew-doorona ka juni jaramu.
Bulu: Metine mekôn me mbe mvot, akob dab a ayemaʼa dab ke mboon a silba. Mekôn mese ya nseñ me mbe nlatan a ayemaʼa silba.
Guiziga: Sivirzi ngi ɓamtalay, i ɓiri gazahay, gwat ngi kilik naŋ ati pontihey i ɓiri barahay. Ɓamtalaya, a puyaka taŋ ɓiri barahay jigaɓ jigaɓ a muŋ. A kam ɓiri bara gindaɗɗa ngi ja ɓamtalaya gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kosɗe daŋraŋge ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri. Ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi. Cudduɗum ko'e maaje boo ɗum cardi. Daŋraŋge daldal fuu kawriti bee gaafe cardi.
Fulfulde_DC: Kosɗe daŋraŋge ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri. Ɓilduɗe daŋraŋge e gaafe maaje ɗe cardi. Cudduɗum ko'e maaje boo ɗum cardi. Daŋraŋge daldal fuu kawriti bee gaafe cardi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gun mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ ndɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi. Wa yɔka ɗoŋ o gan-ndui nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ wa dee nɛ bu-mbɔi mɔi̧a o mbiŋ lɛŋ e nu ŋmaa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gun mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ ndɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi. Wa yɔka ɗoŋ o gan-ndui nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ wa dee nɛ bu-mbɔi mɔi̧a o mbiŋ lɛŋ e nu ŋmaa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəshi nyi kentare yɛ selə ne, le mze kwa ghwə ghwə hɛ, le mze kwa tɛawetɛa yɛ ndɛaŋe ba'a yɛ geta. Ma ghəa selə nyi nza pəkələ yite ne, kefi fi ŋkɛ le mze le mze kwa tɛawetɛa. Pɛtɛa selə nyi yitea ŋwela shɛ tejikə le geta nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa.
Tupurri: Kray ma glog gefay hay wo diñ boo dobe, boore ma äal gefayn wo de boore ma heer oçoçben hay wo diñ boo solay. Ti äaara ma de dla'gen hay wo de äo'ge go ti diñ boo solay. Dog ma yiñ ti feelen hay wo de yiñ do see kaçaçra diñ de boo ma heer oçoçbe maga diñ boo solay mono.

Francais: Le rideau de la porte du parvis était un ouvrage de dessin varié, en pourpre violette, pourpre écarlate, cramoisi, et lin retors; sa longueur était de vingt coudées, et sa hauteur de cinq coudées, comme la largeur des rideaux du parvis;
Anglais: And the hanging for the gate of the court was needlework, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen: and twenty cubits was the length, and the height in the breadth was five cubits, answerable to the hangings of the court.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sligar-ma-gaɓayna ma ka hay vun wur-daŋŋa ciliy hiɗi baraw ma tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna hiɗi ma tuwam slawna, hiɗi baraw-haɓna ma duɓarayna; fiyokka valamu ir goldoŋ dok-ma', fiyokka valam ta kulota ir goldoŋ vasl, ŋray ca ki buɗukŋa vi sligar-gaɓayna ma hay wur-daŋŋa nala;
Bulu: Eyé é nga tyele mbé ya nseñ é mbe mbamba ntiñan jôm minsinga mi too blum, mfô, évele a éfumulu; éyé te é too menyiʼi me mo mewôm mebaé; ôya yôb menyiʼi me mo metan avale fe ane ndam biyé ya nseñ;
Guiziga: Zana minjar a mizlingre ngi wazlaraya, i midira ˀay ngi zanahay mijaka ti gugumay mislirkeɗ, lahaɗ ti ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy, munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze. Zana nah, jek naŋ metir kuruˀ, yo gil naŋ metir cuw ti reta, rak rak ati zanahay minjar njar a wazlaray tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi wiirndallo ngam nastirde daldal bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, ɗum tuppitaaɗum. Njuutirka maago meetir sappo, towirka maago boo meetir ɗiɗi bee reeta, kal-kal bee wiirndallooji daldal.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi wiirndallo ngam nastirde daldal bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, ɗum tuppitaaɗum. Njuutirka maago meetir sappo, towirka maago boo meetir ɗiɗi bee reeta, kal-kal bee wiirndallooji daldal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa toka laa-kpe nu tua-zala tok nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa; pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta hee wan mɛ nú-zala ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa toka laa-kpe nu tua-zala tok nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa; pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta hee wan mɛ nú-zala ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mɛa ŋkwa kedzeki ne, pa ka tsa zlave tsate mayafe le pawa nyi berete berete, welaɗe mbe shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ. Ma mayafea shɛ ne, kamɛtre meŋe biya ta ŋkɛ ba'a kamɛtre bake ba'a kwete gasle yite dzeme ghweme ta ŋkɛ, kala bezlea zlave nya dzeyi yitea ŋwela.
Tupurri: OÇoçbe ma jag feelen hay diñ joñre ma de äo'ge äo'ge de saale ma de seçeç cuwa, de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ, de leçeç ma kefkefe. Depaçaçge äe hay nen ngaä meder hwale, geçeçre äe ciñ nen meder äog de nusi, diy äe do oçoçbe ma de yiñ ti feelen wo mono.

Francais: ses quatre colonnes et leurs quatre socles étaient d'airain, les crochets et leurs tringles d'argent, et leurs chapiteaux revêtus d'argent.
Anglais: And their pillars were four, and their sockets of brass four; their hooks of silver, and the overlaying of their chapiters and their fillets of silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: dolla ma hayam fiɗina hiɗi diram ma yori gaa fiɗina kotay hiɗi wayna, sle ma gaɓna hiɗi zigew ma hayamna kotay hiɗi doorota, yalam ma kulona koray hiɗi doorota.
Bulu: mekôn menyin a metine menyin mab me mbe mvot, akob a ayemaʼa dab e mbe silba, soʼo jap é mbe nduban silba.
Guiziga: A luwaka avu ɓamtal ngi ɓiri gazahay mufaɗ, yo li ngi ɓamtalaya i ɓiri gazahay mufaɗa ma, gwat ngi kilik naŋhay, pontihey waɗ ɓamtalay jigaɓ jigaɓ ti muŋ i ɓiri barahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi daŋraŋge maago nayi bee kosɗe maaje nayi ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri, ɓilduɗe maaje boo ɗe cardi, non boo cudduɗum ko'e maaje e gaafe maaje.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi daŋraŋge maago nayi bee kosɗe maaje nayi ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri, ɓilduɗe maaje boo ɗe cardi, non boo cudduɗum ko'e maaje e gaafe maaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O mbiŋ-a naar in o gun-aa lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ; wa dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ tɛ o mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ bu-mbɔi ɗoŋ o gan-ndui in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O mbiŋ-a naar in o gun-aa lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ; wa dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ tɛ o mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ bu-mbɔi ɗoŋ o gan-ndui in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Te selə wəfaɗe nyi le mze kwa ghwə ghwə nyi mentare te wəshi kentare selə ndɛndɛaŋeyi geva ŋkɛ. Le mze kwa tɛawetɛa vɛsəte geva yɛ ndɛaŋe, le mze kwa tɛawetɛa fikɛ geva yɛ ghəa selə nyi nza pəkələ yite ba'a yɛ geta.
Tupurri: Kray äaara ma naan wo de gefay äaara ma naan hay wo diñ boo dobe. Boore ma äal ragen wo de boore ma heer oçoçben hay wo diñ boo solay, day dla'ge ti äaaran hay go de äo' boo solay ti.

Francais: Tous les pieux pour la Demeure et pour l'enceinte du parvis étaient d'airain.
Anglais: And all the pins of the tabernacle, and of the court round about, were of brass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gu ma piy gaana kaf ma ka kalaf hay wur-daŋŋa kotay hiɗi wayna.
Bulu: Mekôn mese ya mbômaʼan ya tabernakel a ma ya nseñ me mbe mvot.
Guiziga: Dum ngi guɗukoy, yo dum ngi zlavaɗ ngi wazlaraya gar, i ɓiri gazahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tiggirɗe jooɗorde senaande e daldal fuu ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: Tiggirɗe jooɗorde senaande e daldal fuu ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O te mgboia fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ in te-mgboi nú-zala lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O te mgboia fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ in te-mgboi nú-zala lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa wəshi nyi kebaŋeyi geva kwa hɛɗi dzeyi yitea cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a dzeyi yitea ŋwela nya yite ne, le mze kwa ghwə ghwə hɛ.
Tupurri: Boore ma deñ mburyugn wo de äil feelen äuy hay wo diñ boo dobe.

Francais: Voici le compte des choses qui ont été employées pour la Demeure, la Demeure du témoignage, compte dressé par le soin des Lévites sur l'ordre de Moïse et sous la direction d'Ithamar, fils du grand prêtre Aaron.
Anglais: This is the sum of the tabernacle, even of the tabernacle of testimony, as it was counted, according to the commandment of Moses, for the service of the Levites, by the hand of Ithamar, son to Aaron the priest.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi ŋaɓta vi slen ma li lop tabernaklen ma fi-tuwna, nisi hot ɗuwum mara'a kuɗ va ma Musus di'e. Lop namna kotom kayni si sa Levitna sa ka gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Itamar, goora vi Mul-ma-ɗifinna Aaron.
Bulu: Tañ ése ya biôm ya tabernakel nje nyô: Tabernakel ya ba baʼale bifase mekoʼo metiñ, avale ane Môze a nga mane tak a kalane de mo betuni, Itamar mone Aron a too ntebe ôsu.
Guiziga: Gwat migam taŋ slra ngi ɗiya guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ, guɗuk ngi pi beleler ngi jumoˀayay anga na, taˀ naŋ ani: Moyis a pula jiviɗ da Levihey ɓa a gaka slra nah. Buy ngi slra i Itamar mangal ngi masay Aroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa lisaafi kuuje jooɗorde senaande, nokkuure ngam seedamku alkawal. Lewi'en mbaɗi ɗum fodde umroore Muusa dow ardaaŋgal Itamar ɓii Haruna, limanjo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa lisaafi kuuje jooɗorde senaande, nokkuure ngam seedamku alkawal. Lewi'en mbaɗi ɗum fodde umroore Muusa dow ardaaŋgal Itamar ɓii Haruna, limanjo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ o bíí ndɛma mɛ de nɛ fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ fara e sɛka-ta-heembea nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Nɛ́ Moisɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ tɔr o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o be Levii a̧ tɔra tɔra-a. Gasa wi-zɔk-tom'i nɛ Itamar, bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ o bíí ndɛma mɛ de nɛ fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ fara e sɛka-ta-heembea nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Nɛ́ Moisɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ tɔr o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o be Levii a̧ tɔra tɔra-a. Gasa wi-zɔk-tom'i nɛ Itamar, bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse kwelea mze nyi menehwe slene mbeli le kezha cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke, nya tenza pelɛ nyi slapesla slapesla mbe. Kala nya gezete Moyize ne, ka Lɛvi nyi nza Itamar, wəzege ta nde dzeghe Shala Aron te ghəa nci, ka ɓelate hɛ.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ keege feçeçre mburyug no. Mburyug maga waçaçre sedewan wo ni mono. Boore maga aè joñ joñre de äaara ni äuy ga aè kee ra day faage äen hay diñ do jar Lefid wo do maga Moyis waçaçn go nono, je ma pel joñre keege feçeçren diñ Itamar, je ni je sië jag Aaron no.

Francais: Béseléel, fils d'Uri, fils de Hur, de la tribu de Juda, fit tout ce que Yahweh avait ordonné à Moïse;
Anglais: And Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, made all that the  Lord  commanded Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Betsaleel goora vi Uriyas, goor-ŋolona vi Hur, ma hay jafna vi Yudana, nam li slen ma Musus dum kalamna kafe;
Bulu: Betsalél mona Uri, ndaé Ur ya nda bôte Yuda. A nga bo mam mese Nti a nga bendé Môze;
Guiziga: Besalel, mbur Zuda mangal ngi Ur, dideˀ ngi Hur, a ga slra Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le da Moyis na le gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Becaleel ɓii Uuri taaniraawo Huuru mo lenyol Yahuuda, kaŋko waɗi ko Jawmiraawo umri Muusa fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Becaleel ɓii Uuri taaniraawo Huuru mo lenyol Yahuuda, kaŋko waɗi ko Jawmiraawo umri Muusa fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Besalɛl, bem ko Urii, be-koo Hur, zuduk ko Juda dee tom nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ mɛ de'i lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Besalɛl, bem ko Urii, be-koo Hur, zuduk ko Juda dee tom nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ mɛ de'i lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Bɛsalɛl, wəzege ta Əwri ba'a shia Həwr, kwa yita ta Zhəwda nde menete wəshi nyi gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize.
Tupurri: Betsalel je ni Uri no, je ni Hur ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan joñ feçeçren wo äuy do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis nono.

Francais: il eut pour aide Ooliab, fils Achisamech, de la tribu de Dan, habile à sculpter, à inventer, à tisser en dessin varié la pourpre violette, la pourpre écarlate, le cramoisi, et le fin lin.
Anglais: And with him was Aholiab, son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan, an engraver, and a cunning workman, and an embroiderer in blue, and in purple, and in scarlet, and fine linen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa ma gutum hay lopna kayni mi Oholiyab, goora vi Ahisamak, ma hay jafna vi Dan, sa ma iram yali kay ɗo slena, kay wi yal slena, kay cil sligara ma tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna, ma tuwam slawna hiɗi baraw haɓna ma ciliyna.
Bulu: ba Ohôliab, mona Anisamak ya nda bôte Dañ, nkpwelé biôm, mbôndé mefek a ntiñe bindélé bi ne blum, mfô, évele a éfumulu.
Guiziga: Oholiyap, mbur Daŋ, mangal ngi Ahisamak, taŋ bummoˀ, Oholiyap i mbur miciɗa ɗugur mupuɗaw puɗaway, mutoho foto ngi gwatay, migi wuya da zana ngi ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy, munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze, yo migi wuya da zana mija ti gugumay mislirkeɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kuuwdiɗɗiraawo maako Oholiyabu ɓii Ahisamak mo lenyol Dan, o cehoowo kaa'e, o tuppitoowo e cannyoowo limce leŋ ɗigguɗe carwinaaɗe e boɗeeje seɗɗa e boɗeeje coy.
Fulfulde_DC: Kuuwdiɗɗiraawo maako Oholiyabu ɓii Ahisamak mo lenyol Dan, o cehoowo kaa'e, o tuppitoowo e cannyoowo limce leŋ ɗigguɗe carwinaaɗe e boɗeeje seɗɗa e boɗeeje coy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi nɛ gbaka a̧ tɛ tom nɛ́ Oholiab, bem ko Ahisamak, zuduk ko Dan; a̧ iŋa tom-sɛka-mɔ, tom-gɔna-dap-mɔ, in tom-toka-tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi nɛ gbaka a̧ tɛ tom nɛ́ Oholiab, bem ko Ahisamak, zuduk ko Dan; a̧ iŋa tom-sɛka-mɔ, tom-gɔna-dap-mɔ, in tom-toka-tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: Oholiyab, wəzege ta Ahisamak, kwa yita ta Dan nya kande tsehe pelɛ, kande rafe pa ta wəshi, kande tsa lekwesa le shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ ba'a nya kande tsa wəshi le pawa nde kemanakɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Je kayge äen ni hay diñ Oholiyab je ni Ahisamak no, ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Dañ no. AÀ de ëeñ ma gaë feçeçre, ma car jag joñ feçeçre, ma äod feçeçre ti oçoçbe ma de raçëge de seçeçre cuwan wo, de seçeçre burbur wo, ma de seçeçre yiñyiñ wo, de oçoçbe leçeç ma kefkef wora.

Francais: Total de l'or employé à l'ouvrage, pour tout l'ouvrage du sanctuaire, or qui était le produit des offrandes : vingt-neuf talents et sept cent trente sicles, selon le sicle du sanctuaire.
Anglais: All the gold that was occupied for the work in all the work of the holy place, even the gold of the offering, was twenty and nine talents, and seven hundred and thirty shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Or ma sumun vulum ɦawana, ma nisi tapam noŋ kaf kay li lopna vi liyn ma peldetna kayni, nam co noŋ pet ir talente dok-ma' yam zleeŋe, hiɗi sikel kis-karkiya hiɗi diram dok-ɦidi, kuɗ ŋaɓta vi sikel ma hay liyn ma peldetna.
Bulu: Abime mvot ese be nga belane de asu bisaé bise ya vôm a ne étyi e nga kui bekiligram toyini éla a mewôm mebaé, avale ane ôveʼe ya nda Zambe ô né.
Guiziga: Ɓiri tapasl tapasl, Israyeley muvulaka ngi ɗiya guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ, a jum gar na: kilo skat skat dangafaɗ ti kukur tarnaˀ ti tarnaˀ waɗ gram skat skat makir. A waka ti kilo mawam di gwat ar guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mooɓgal kaŋŋeeri ndi ɓe kuuwtiniri ngam kuuɗe suudu seniindu fuu, waato kaŋŋeeri dokkal, waɗi baakin kilo teemeɗɗe joweetati e cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi e joweeɗiɗi (877) fodde etirgal suudu seniindu.
Fulfulde_DC: Mooɓgal kaŋŋeeri ndi ɓe kuuwtiniri ngam kuuɗe suudu seniindu fuu, waato kaŋŋeeri dokkal, waɗi baakin kilo teemeɗɗe joweetati e cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi e joweeɗiɗi (877) fodde etirgal suudu seniindu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dita lɔr lɛŋ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ wen tom  sa̧a̧-fara  duka nɛ kilo gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dita lɔr lɛŋ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ wen tom  sa̧a̧-fara  duka nɛ kilo gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa mze kwa tere tere nya tsehete ka Israyɛl ba'a nya menehwe slene mbeli le kezha slene ta cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ne, kiləwə gwəmsə deghese ba'a mberefaŋemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe ba'a gwəmsə mahekene kwa slibə ta bela ta kiləwə, kala wəsə kedzeghe ɗaŋeɗa ta wəshi nya mbe cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke.
Tupurri: Boo biñni maga jar Israyel hay tayn wo le ma boo ngeel ma bay ëagn mono, poçoçre äe hay nen mañ klew kiskis nenma' ti äe do renam ti renam de gram ti äe ni kiskis swa'a. Sen diñ de mo ngaä feçeçre maga aà hay ngaä feçeçren de äe wursen ti ngeel ma bay ëagn mono.

Francais: L'argent de ceux de l'assemblée qui furent recensés s'élevait à cent talents et mille sept cent soixante-quinze sicles, selon le sicle du sanctuaire.
Anglais: And the silver of them that were numbered of the congregation was an hundred talents, and a thousand seven hundred and threescore and fifteen shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa hay tokŋa sa ŋaɓsi goyna gurjuta visi co noŋ pet talente kis, hiɗi sikel birim kep hiɗi diram kis-siɗiya hiɗi diram dok-siɗiya yam vasl. Kuɗ ŋaɓta vi sikel ma hay liyn ma peldetna.
Bulu: Moné ase a nga veban éyoñ ya élañ bôt a mbe bekiligram toyini éla a kili awôm a zamgbwa a begram mintet zamgbwa a mewôm metaan, aval ane ôveʼe adit biôm ya nda Zambe ô né.
Guiziga: Ɓiri bara mizli muvulaka, slaf slaf na, a jum gar na: kilo durmuk makir ti kuruˀ nga tarnaˀ, waɗ gram skat tarnaˀ ti kukur zlum. A waka ti kilo mawam di gwat ar guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Cardi diga yimɓe jama'aare limaaɓe fuu waɗi baakin kilo ujine tati e sappo e joweetati (3.018) fodde etirgal suudu seniindu.
Fulfulde_DC: Cardi diga yimɓe jama'aare limaaɓe fuu waɗi baakin kilo ujine tati e sappo e joweetati (3.018) fodde etirgal suudu seniindu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dita bu-mbɔi nɛ o bíí mɔi̧a so ŋgimbi tɔra bíí duka nɛ kilo booro-taar-nɛ-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dita bu-mbɔi nɛ o bíí mɔi̧a so ŋgimbi tɔra bíí duka nɛ kilo booro-taar-nɛ-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa mze kwa tɛawetɛa nya kese va mbeli nyi keɓelate geva ne, kiləwə 3.017 ba'a gwəmsə mberefaŋe ba'a mcɛfemsə kwa slibə ta bela ta kiləwə, kala wəsə kedzeghe ɗaŋeɗa ta wəshi nya mbe cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke.
Tupurri: Boo solay maga tayge jarn tay wo le day aè keen mono aà tay äuy poçoçre äe hay nen mañ klew ndar swa' ti äe hwal ti renam de gram ti äe ni kiskis renam ti äe do dwee. Sen diñ de mo ngaä feçeçre maga aà hay ngaä feçeçre de äe wursen ti ngeel ma bay ëagn mono.

Francais: C'était un béka par tête, la moitié d'un sicle, selon le sicle du sanctuaire, pour chaque homme compris dans le recensement, depuis l'âge de vingt ans et au-dessus, soit pour six cent trois mille cinq cent cinquante hommes.
Anglais: A bekah for every man, that is, half a shekel, after the shekel of the sanctuary, for every one that went to be numbered, from twenty years old and upward, for six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty men.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayn di ala gal sikel kep kay san kepe. Kuɗ ŋaɓta vi sikel ma ka hay liyn ma peldetna. Ŋray kay sum sa ŋaɓay goyna, tun caw tam busat dok-ma' ta-ta voko. Ŋray kay sumun birim kis-karkiya hiɗi diram ɦidi hiɗi kis-vasl hiɗi diram dok-vasl.
Bulu: Fam ése é nga lañeban a taté mimbu mewôm mebaé a mitan a ke ôsu é nga ve bekiligram awôm a betan, aval ane ôveʼe ya nda Zambe ô né. Befam bese be mbe toyini mintet misaman a éla mintet mitan a mewôm metan.
Guiziga: Muvulaka i mizli ngi vi kukur cuw malla fineˀ nah, taŋ mizli durmuk skat skat merkeɗ ti makir, ti skat skat zlum ti kukur zlum, mizli muslufahaya, mbur gar a vul gram zlum zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo moy fuu hokki reeta ceede cardi fodde etirgal suudu seniindu, waato koo moy nastuɗo limgal limaaɓe fuu mo duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri: Worɓe ujine teemeɗɗe njoweego e tato e teemeɗɗe njowo e cappanɗe njowo (603.550) .
Fulfulde_DC: Koo moy fuu hokki reeta ceede cardi fodde etirgal suudu seniindu, waato koo moy nastuɗo limgal limaaɓe fuu mo duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri: Worɓe ujine teemeɗɗe njoweego e tato e teemeɗɗe njowo e cappanɗe njowo (603.550) .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóó o nde ha̧a̧ nɛ reeta sule nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  wen o bíí lɛŋ nɛ kpaa pɛ ɓu-yiitoo kóó gan mbɛt nɛ‘i tɔra. Wa lɛŋ nɛ booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóó o nde ha̧a̧ nɛ reeta sule nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  wen o bíí lɛŋ nɛ kpaa pɛ ɓu-yiitoo kóó gan mbɛt nɛ‘i tɔra. Wa lɛŋ nɛ booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma zhili nyi ɓelate nyi mbeli 603.550, se te va bakemsə kajive mbe kema ne, mcɛfe kwa slibə ta bela ta kiləwəa mze kwa tɛawetɛa keleke yayata wəndəa nci.
Tupurri: Pur äen hay tay mokay, diñ ga wosela caw hay haç boo nen gram dwee, noga nen nus äe. Sen diñ de mo maga aè hay ngaä feçeçre de äe wursen ti ngeel ma bay ëagn mono. Yoo jar Israyel ma ndar do hiira' ti swa' de kiskis dwee ti äe dween wo mono, je maga kiñgi äe hay go do äog noga de ti mono hay de keege äuy.

Francais: Les cent talents d'argent servirent à fondre les socles du sanctuaire et les socles du voile, cent socles pour les cent talents, un talent par socle.
Anglais: And of the hundred talents of silver were cast the sockets of the sanctuary, and the sockets of the veil; an hundred sockets of the hundred talents, a talent for a socket.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi talente ma kisna, nisi yor dir (dolla vi) liyn ma peldetna hiɗi dir (dolla vi) sligar-gaɓayna. Talente ma kisna yor dir dolla kis lay, talente kep kay dolla kep.
Bulu: Kilôgram silba toyini éla é nga volô asu metin ya vôm a ne étyi a asu éyé ja kandé, metin ntet asu kiligram toyini éla, tin ése é nga nyoñ kiligram silba mewôm mela.
Guiziga: A tikam ɓiri bara, kilo durmuk makir, ngi pi sivirzi ngi ɓamtalay miskat ngir guɗuko, waɗ ngi sivirzi ngi ɓamtal ngi zana minjar ti huroˀo, mbiɗeˀvra, sivirzi ngi ɓamtal gar, a zum kilo kukur makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kilo cardi ujine tati (3.000) ɓolinaama ngam kosɗe suudu seniindu e kosɗe wiirndallo, kosɗe teemerre bee kilo ujine tati (3.000), waato kilo cappanɗe tati ngam kosŋgal gootal.
Fulfulde_DC: Kilo cardi ujine tati (3.000) ɓolinaama ngam kosɗe suudu seniindu e kosɗe wiirndallo, kosɗe teemerre bee kilo ujine tati (3.000), waato kilo cappanɗe tati ngam kosŋgal gootal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa nɔi̧a kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar de nɛ gun  sa̧a̧-fara  gɔmŋmaa in o gun babir gɔmŋmaa. Gun-aa kpɔk baa nɛ kilo ɓu-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa nɔi̧a kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar de nɛ gun  sa̧a̧-fara  gɔmŋmaa in o gun babir gɔmŋmaa. Gun-aa kpɔk baa nɛ kilo ɓu-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Kiləwəa mze kwa tɛawetɛa 3.000 menehwe slene mbeli le kezha vɛsə wəshi kentare selə gwəmsə kezha cɛ lekwesa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a kezha mayafe nya mbe mbe, geze ta ŋkɛ, kiləwə mahekenemsə kaŋa yayata wəsə kentare selə.
Tupurri: Boo solay nen klew ndar swa'a, aè joñ sen diñ ma yor kray ne gefay ma kiñkiñ ma kis ma ti ngeel ma bay ëagn were, de ma wer oçoçbe ma nen äil no. Glog gefay ka' boñ ree klew do swa'a.

Francais: Et avec les mille sept cent soixante-quinze sicles, on fit les crochets pour les colonnes, on revêtit les chapiteaux et on les joignit par des tringles.
Anglais: And of the thousand seven hundred seventy and five shekels he made hooks for the pillars, and overlaid their chapiters, and filleted them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sikel ma ir birim kep hiɗi diram kis-siɗiya, hiɗi diram dok-siɗiya yam vaslna, nisi kot sle ma gaɓna hiɗi zigewna vi dolla, nisi kor yam dolla kaw.
Bulu: Wôna kiligram silba mewôm mebaé nyô nje be nga bo je akop a ayemaʼa asu mekôn, ane fe be nga dube soʼo jap.
Guiziga: Is naŋ mindir kilo kuru nga tarnaˀ ti gram skat skat tarnaˀti kukur zlum na, a ɗiyam di gwat ngi kilika zana avu ɓamtalay, a puyaka da ɓamtalaya jigaɓ jigaɓ ti muŋ, yo a ɗiyam di ɓiri migilaɗ ngi ji ɓamtalay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bee cardi baakin kilo sappo e joweetati luttundi, o waɗi ɓilduɗe haa daŋraŋge, o suddi ko'e maaje, o hawriti ɗe bee gaafe.
Fulfulde_DC: Bee cardi baakin kilo sappo e joweetati luttundi, o waɗi ɓilduɗe haa daŋraŋge, o suddi ko'e maaje, o hawriti ɗe bee gaafe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko oi kilo bu-mbɔi ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, Besalɛl dee nɛ o boi-kɔk-mɔ tɛ mbiŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔk nɛ ɗoŋ o gan-ndui in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ mɔi̧a o mbiŋ e nu ŋmaa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko oi kilo bu-mbɔi ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, Besalɛl dee nɛ o boi-kɔk-mɔ tɛ mbiŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔk nɛ ɗoŋ o gan-ndui in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ mɔi̧a o mbiŋ e nu ŋmaa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kiləwə meŋe mberefaŋeghəmbe ba'a gwəmsə mberefaŋe ba'a mcɛfemsə kwa slibə ta bela ta kiləwə nyi ketene ne, pa mbeli menete ndɛaŋe nyi te selə, pa mbeli fikɛ yɛ ghəa selə nyi nza pəkələ yite ba'a pa mbeli vɛsəte geta nyi kejikə yɛ selə.
Tupurri: Klew ma ndar hwal ti renam ti äe nen gram kiskis renam ti äe do dwee ga gwa' mono, aè joñ feçeçre ma lan wo de äe. Joñ boore ma äal feçeçren wo, joñ boore ma heer oçoçbe ti gefay ma kiñkiñ wo, äo' lan go ti ti äe ma de dla'gen wo no.

Francais: L'airain des offrandes montait à soixante-dix talents et deux mille quatre cent sicles.
Anglais: And the brass of the offering was seventy talents, and two thousand and four hundred shekels.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wayna ma nisi vulum ɦawana tap noŋ pet ir talente dok-siɗiya, hiɗi sikel birim ma', hiɗi diram kis-fiɗi.
Bulu: Mvot be nga ve é nga kui kiligram toyini ébaé a ntet wua a mewôm mebaé a ésaman.
Guiziga: Ɓiri gaza Israyeley muvulaka, a gi jom gar na, kilo durmuk cuw ti skat ti kukur cuw nga mufaɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Dokkal njamndi mboɗeeri waɗi baakin kilo ujine ɗiɗi e teemerre e noogas e nayi (2.124).
Fulfulde_DC: Dokkal njamndi mboɗeeri waɗi baakin kilo ujine ɗiɗi e teemerre e noogas e nayi (2.124).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ndɛrɛ nɛ bíí ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN kura nɛ kilo booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ndɛrɛ nɛ bíí ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN kura nɛ kilo booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa mze kwa ghwə ghwə nya tseheke ka Israyɛl ne, kiləwə 2.124.
Tupurri: Boo dob haçge maga aè hay haçn äuy mono hay joñ go nen mañ klew ndar äog ti äe kisi de do äog ti naa.

Francais: On en fit les socles de l'entrée de la tente de réunion, l'autel d'airain avec sa grille d'airain et tous les ustensiles de l'autel,
Anglais: And therewith he made the sockets to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and the brasen altar, and the brasen grate for it, and all the vessels of the altar,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dolla ma ka hay vun guɗuk ma fi-tuwna nisi yorom diram gaa'a, giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma kawayna hiɗi kaway-ciliyna, hiɗi slen ma li lop hay giwin-ma-ɗifinna kafe;
Bulu: Be nga belane je asu metin ya anyiin nda bisulan, asu ataʼa metunaʼa mvot, étañ mvot a biôm mebelan bise ya ataʼa metunaʼa;
Guiziga: A ɗiyam di sivirzi ngi ɓamtalay a mizlingre guɗuk ngi zlir ti ya Buymisemuŋ. A ɗiyam di li gi mikuli jom ati griyaz naŋ, waɗ gwat ngi slra ngir li gi mikuli gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bee maari o waɗi kosɗe dammugal laymaaru fottirde e hirsirde njamndi mboɗeeri bee kuuwaaɗum jamɗe gaafiiɗe haa maare e kuuje hirsirde fuu
Fulfulde_DC: Bee maari o waɗi kosɗe dammugal laymaaru fottirde e hirsirde njamndi mboɗeeri bee kuuwaaɗum jamɗe gaafiiɗe haa maare e kuuje hirsirde fuu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ i̧i̧ a̧ a̧ dee nɛ o gun fara-yea-a si kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, in  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ká bá nɛ̀ sina-mɔɔ-yí-a in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ i̧i̧ a̧ a̧ dee nɛ o gun fara-yea-a si kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, in  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ká bá nɛ̀ sina-mɔɔ-yí-a in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli menehwe slene le kezha vɛsə wəshi kentare selə nyi mɛa ŋkwa kedzembe cɛ lekwesa kebegeme geva, reghwetɛ nya le mze kwa ghwə ghwə ba'a wəsə nya kala lɛ kepesa sli dzeyi yite le mze kwa ghwə ghwə, pɛtɛa wəshi kemene slene te reghwetɛ,
Tupurri: AÈ joñ kray ma glog ngeel kalge wo ti Tiñ Yiñgi de Baa no. Ngeel sië jagn de boo dob äe no, de boo äe ma nen yraçaçraçaç no, de feçeçre joñre ma ti ngeel sië jagn wo ni äuy.

Francais: les socles de l'enceinte du parvis et les socles de la porte du parvis, et tous les pieux de la Demeure et tous les pieux de l'enceinte du parvis.
Anglais: And the sockets of the court round about, and the sockets of the court gate, and all the pins of the tabernacle, and all the pins of the court round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dolla vi wur-daŋŋa, ŋuyum tuwam kaf, dolla vi vun-ziyna vi wur-daŋŋa; hiɗi gu ma piy gaana kaf ma ka kalaf hay tabernaklena hiɗi wur-daŋŋa.
Bulu: asu metin ya nseñ, mekôn mese ya mbômaʼan tabernakel a asu mekôn mese ntôbaʼane ya nseñ.
Guiziga: A ɗiyam di sivirzi ngi ɓamtal ngi sar ngi zlavaɗay waɗ ngi mizlingreŋ nga wazlaray, yo dum ngi guɗuk ngi Buymisemuŋ, ati dum ngi sar ngi zlavaɗ ngi wazlaray.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e kosɗe daldal fuu e kosɗe nastirde maagal e tiggirɗe jooɗorde senaande e tiggirɗe daldal fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: e kosɗe daldal fuu e kosɗe nastirde maagal e tiggirɗe jooɗorde senaande e tiggirɗe daldal fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ dee o gun zala, in o gun nu tua yea-a si nú-zala in o te-mgboi-tua'i in o wan mɛ mgboi nú-zala mbɛt nɛ ndɛrɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ dee o gun zala, in o gun nu tua yea-a si nú-zala in o te-mgboi-tua'i in o wan mɛ mgboi nú-zala mbɛt nɛ ndɛrɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: wəshi kentare selə nyi dzeyi yitea ŋwela nya yite ba'a nyi mɛa ŋkwa kedzeki, tsagha wəshi nyi baŋeyi mbeli kwa hɛɗi dzeyi yitea ŋkwa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a dzeyi yitea ŋwela nya yite.
Tupurri: Kray ma glog gefay ma de cir ti feelen äuy, de ma jag tiñ feelen wo no, de boore ma deñ äil mburyug wo no, de feele no.

Francais: On fit l'éphod d'or, de pourpre violette, de pourpre écarlate, de cramoisi et de lin retors.
Anglais: And he made the ephod of gold, blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot sligar-ŋoŋŋa hiɗi ora, hiɗi baraw ma tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna, na slawna hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna.
Bulu: Be nga bo éfôd a mvot, minsinga mi too blum, mfô, évele a éfumulu.
Guiziga: A tufam jampa ti gugumay mislirkeɗ lahaɗ ti ngwic ngi tumuŋ, munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze, yo dar dar ti gugumay ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi ɗancikiire bee kaŋŋeeri e gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi ɗancikiire bee kaŋŋeeri e gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli tsate lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe le pawa nyi berete berete, welaɗe mbe shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ. Pa mbeli tseyi pawa nyi kefi fi le mze kwa tere tere dzeyi te.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ efod de boo biñni, de saale ma de seçeç cuwa, de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ, de leçeç ma kefkefe.

Francais: On étendit l'or en lames et on les coupa en fils, que l'on entrelaça dans la pourpre violette, la pourpre écarlate, le cramoisi et le fin lin ; ouvrage de dessin varié.
Anglais: And they did beat the gold into thin plates, and cut it into wires, to work it in the blue, and in the purple, and in the scarlet, and in the fine linen, with cunning work.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi beɗ or goy heberek', kaam iram goy ki zigewn nala, nisi zlinawam jar sligar ma ciliy hiɗi tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna, ma tuwam slawna, hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna; nam ay kotay ŋaa'a ŋolo.
Bulu: Ane be nga ndamé bibaʼa bi mvot a tyiʼi bie minsinga, éyoñ te be nga ke ba kotan mie e bindélé bi ne blum, mfô, évele a éfumulu été; a mbe mboon jôm atyeñ.
Guiziga: A vuɗam ɓiri tapasl tapasl kefer kefer, a titiraka ɓel ɓel, yo midira ˀay ngi zanahaya, a lihiɗaka ati ngwic ngi tumuŋ munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze, waɗ ti gugumay mislirkeɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi tappaaɗi kaŋŋeeri cewɗi, ɓe ceeli ɗi, ɓe cannyi ɗum bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy. Tuppitoowo baawɗo waɗi ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi tappaaɗi kaŋŋeeri cewɗi, ɓe ceeli ɗi, ɓe cannyi ɗum bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy. Tuppitoowo baawɗo waɗi ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɗafa lɔr lɛfɛ-lɛfɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ɓir fan nɛ ŋmaa in tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bíí nɛ iŋa tom'i a̧ dee dea-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɗafa lɔr lɛfɛ-lɛfɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ɓir fan nɛ ŋmaa in tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bíí nɛ iŋa tom'i a̧ dee dea-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli nzenzereve mze kwa tere tere nya vɛsəte mbeli slɛfe slɛfe slɛahe slɛahe. Pa ka tsa lekwesa welaɗete le shinti ganjia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme keɗema kwa ghɛmɛ, ba'a le pawa.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ mblaaga boo biñni wo, kal celer nen äe go do saale nono, kal taçaçge äe go nen oçoçbe ma de seçeç cuwa no, ma de seçeç burbur no, de ma de seçeç yiñyiñ no, blam äe nen leçeç ma kefkef no. AÀ hay de äo' nen de el debañ.

Francais: On fit des épaulettes pour le joindre, et ainsi il était joint à ses deux extrémités.
Anglais: They made shoulderpieces for it, to couple it together: by the two edges was it coupled together.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot jeŋŋa ma tapam kulona, gaŋam ma ma'na pet tapay kulo'o ki kayn nala.
Bulu: Ane be nga bo je mebaʼa ya bitu a tiñeti me mekuʼu mebaé mfaʼa ya yemete je.
Guiziga: A tufam zeweɗ ngi luwa jampa, ti ka ti ka a mivay naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi balbe haa ɗancikiire ngam jokkindirgo nde. Nde jokkindira haa seɓattooji maare ɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi balbe haa ɗancikiire ngam jokkindirgo nde. Nde jokkindira haa seɓattooji maare ɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa fura nyak-kasa-a yiitoo e nú-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa fura nyak-kasa-a yiitoo e nú-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha hwepe lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe ne, pa hɛ ntsəzləyi zewe bake laka yayata bela.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ soole äe ma yiñ jag äe ma äogn wo ni. Diñ dosen ga jag äe ma cwedcwed hay wo de yiñgi see kaçaçra mono.

Francais: La ceinture pour attacher l'éphod en passant dessus faisait corps avec lui et était du même travail; elle était d'or, de pourpre violette, de pourpre écarlate, de cramoisi et de lin retors, comme Yahweh l'avait ordonné à Moïse.
Anglais: And the curious girdle of his ephod, that was upon it, was of the same, according to the work thereof; of gold, blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen; as the  Lord  commanded Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kantina nisi kotom hiɗi sle ma kot sligar-ŋoŋŋa kaw, nam ka juni kulo kalamu; nam kotay hiɗi ora, hiɗi ɓaraw ma tuwam zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna hiɗi ma tuwam slawna, hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna, ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagata tam Musus nala.
Bulu: Kandé é mbe ébômaʼane je é mbe mboon avale da: Mvot, minsinga mi ne blum, mfô, évele a éfumulu, nlatan jôme jia a éfôd ébien, avale Nti a nga bendé Môze.
Guiziga: Jampa i mija surlum ati gwat ngi juw naŋ ti gugumay misi purla, i mija kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le da Moyis.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Taadorgol gonŋgol dow ɗancikiire ngam haɓɓugo nde, ɓe mbaɗi ngol bana ɗancikiire bee kaŋŋeeri e gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee ɗancikiire, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
Fulfulde_DC: Taadorgol gonŋgol dow ɗancikiire ngam haɓɓugo nde, ɓe mbaɗi ngol bana ɗancikiire bee kaŋŋeeri e gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, ɗum laati kuuwaaɗum gootum bee ɗancikiire, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ kpɔk tom'i a̧ wa dee nɛ kanda-hɛr zu Efod; wa dea-a nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ kpɔk tom'i a̧ wa dee nɛ kanda-hɛr zu Efod; wa dea-a nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma zewe nya dzeyi yitea lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe ne, kanya kwetɛŋe ŋkɛ le, kala nya gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize.
Tupurri: Mblaagan hay de joñge do efodn no lay, day hay de sa'ge ti äe. AÀ hay diñ boo biñni, de saale ma de seçeç cuwa, ma de seçeç burburi, de ma de seçeç yiñyiñ, de saale leçeç ma kefkefe, do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis nono.

Francais: On fit les pierres d'onyx enchâssées dans des chatons d'or, sur lesquelles on grava les noms des fils d'Israël,
Anglais: And they wrought onyx stones inclosed in ouches of gold, graven, as signets are graven, with the names of the children of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ŋuy tuw or ma ciyna hiɗi hiɗiyn oniks, nisi ɓir sem gurona vi Israyel kulo kalamu, ki san ɗo hay tampoŋ nala.
Bulu: Be nga ba mekoʼo me ôniks a futi me biôm bi mvot be nga kôm. Ane be nga kpwelé biyôlé bi bôt ya Israél été yôp, ane ba futi sitam .
Guiziga: A ɗiyam ɗugur mupuɗaw kakayak kakayak, a ngbaˀaka taŋ avu ɓiri tapasl tapasl miɗiya jozl jozlo, a tohom slimiɗ ngi ziri ngi Zakopoy le ava fiteɗ fiteɗ, kaɓa mafutuɗam gwat ngi ɗuva slimiɗ ngi mbur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi kaa'e onikis, ɓe nastini ɗe nder jogorɗe ɗe kaŋŋeeri, ɓe mbinndi inɗe ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila dow maaje bee karfeeje ta'aaɗe bana no goɗɗo ta'irta haatummeere.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi kaa'e onikis, ɓe nastini ɗe nder jogorɗe ɗe kaŋŋeeri, ɓe mbinndi inɗe ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila dow maaje bee karfeeje ta'aaɗe bana no goɗɗo ta'irta haatummeere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa sɛka de ta nɛ tok tok kɛn-kɛn, ɓɛɛ wa sakari lɔr e wa sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap hee gɔna dap-tumbal ga, nɛ nin o be  Israɛl  e sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa sɛka de ta nɛ tok tok kɛn-kɛn, ɓɛɛ wa sakari lɔr e wa sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap hee gɔna dap-tumbal ga, nɛ nin o be  Israɛl  e sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ tsehete pelɛ nyi ghemea ghemea nyi nza zləvə te bake ba'a ndendeɓeyi hɛ te ŋkwa nyi bake kefi fi le mze kwa tere tere. Pa hɛ tsaslate sləa ŋwalea Zhakob te hɛ, kala nya tsehe lamba ta wəndə mbeli.
Tupurri: AÈ gir jag huuli Oniks wo de boo biñni, ciñ ti huuli sen wo, aè kal yer ëu jar ni Israyel wo ni, do maga aè krig kase nono.

Francais: comme on grave les cachets. On les plaça sur les épaulettes de l'éphod comme pierres de souvenir pour les enfants d'Israël, comme Yahweh l'avait ordonné à Moïse.
Anglais: And he put them on the shoulders of the ephod, that they should be stones for a memorial to the children of Israel; as the  Lord  commanded Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi cum kulo hay pel sligar-ŋoŋŋa kay gi-humda kay gurona vi Israyel, ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagat tam Musus nala.
Bulu: E nde be nga futi me biwoʼo ya éfôd aval ane mekoʼo ya bo te vuan bôt ya Israél, avale Nti a nga bendé Môze.
Guiziga: A tufam zeweɗ avu jampa, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le da Moyiz zleˀe ngi bigi sukwi ngi Zakopoy mukuruˀ nga cuw na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe peɗi ɗe dow balbe ɗancikiire, ɗe laato kaa'e ngam siftorgo ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe peɗi ɗe dow balbe ɗancikiire, ɗe laato kaa'e ngam siftorgo ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ee o ta nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ nyak Efod wen ha̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o be  Israɛl  hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ee o ta nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ nyak Efod wen ha̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o be  Israɛl  hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ hwepeyi hɛ te lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe kezha ncɛ hwelefe ta Israyɛl nyi meŋe bakeghəmbe, kala nya gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize.
Tupurri: Heer ra ti do efod no, ma ëig ti jar Israyel wo do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis nono.

Francais: On fit le pectoral, artistement travaillé, du même travail que l'éphod, d'or, de pourpre violette, de pourpre écarlate, de cramoisi et de lin retors.
Anglais: And he made the breastplate of cunning work, like the work of the ephod; of gold, blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot birim-ŋoŋŋa kotay hiɗi yal ŋolo, kotom hiɗi sle ma kot sligar-ŋoŋŋa kaw, kotom hiɗi ora, hiɗi baraw ma zim-zimna, ma tuwam cih-cihna, ma slawna hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna.
Bulu: Be nga kôm ébutaʼa tôé, mboon jôm atyeñ fe, bebé ane éfôd, be belaʼan mvot, minsinga mi too blum, mfô, évele a éfumulu.
Guiziga: Misina ɗiya gwatay, a tufam  jiiba   ngi didak ti gugumay mislirkeɗ, lahaɗ ti ngwic ngi tumuŋ munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze, yo dar dar ti gugumay ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl kaɓa jampa tuwa ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tuppitoowo baawɗo waɗi jiiba wiɓɓere, bana o waari ɗancikiire, bee kaŋŋeeri e gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy.
Fulfulde_DC: Tuppitoowo baawɗo waɗi jiiba wiɓɓere, bana o waari ɗancikiire, bee kaŋŋeeri e gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa fura laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa fura nɛ Efod ga; wa fura nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa fura laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa fura nɛ Efod ga; wa fura nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka tsa lekwesa tsate wəsə nya slape kwa hate le pawa nyi berete berete, welaɗe mbe shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ. Pa hɛ tseyi pawa nyi kefi fi le mze kwa tere tere dzeyi te, kala lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ pektoraln de äo'ge de ele, de joñge do efodn no lay. De boo biñni, de saale ma de seçeç cuwa, de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ, de leçeç ma kefkefe.

Francais: Il était carré; on fit le pectoral double; sa longueur était d'un empan et sa largeur d'un empan; il était double.
Anglais: It was foursquare; they made the breastplate double: a span was the length thereof, and a span the breadth thereof, being doubled.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gefem fiɗi kaf ŋray ca; birim-ŋoŋŋa kotay kayn jaɓay kay tuwam ma'; fiyokka valamu ŋa way-ɓamta kepe, buɗukka valamu ŋa way-ɓamta kepe, nam ciy kay tuwam ma'.
Bulu: Nté a ndam abime da; be nga bo je mimbaʼa mibaé, nté ô too centiméta mewôm mebaé a étan. Ebutaʼa tôé te é too mimbaʼa mibaé.
Guiziga: Da a muslaka jiiba le masl cuw na, jek naŋ ati sliprik naŋ, i misi purla, saŋtimetir kukur cuw ti zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ka mari buttuli nayi potanɗi, ɓe cowi ka, njuutirka maaka hapakaare, njaajirka maaka boo hapakaare, ɓe cowi ka.
Fulfulde_DC: Ka mari buttuli nayi potanɗi, ɓe cowi ka, njuutirka maaka hapakaare, njaajirka maaka boo hapakaare, ɓe cowi ka.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ wi-iŋ-tom-aa a̧ dee dea-a. Wa goia laa'i si zu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛm ŋmaa tɛ dɔ̧-er.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ wi-iŋ-tom-aa a̧ dee dea-a. Wa goia laa'i si zu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛm ŋmaa tɛ dɔ̧-er.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa gwaɓete geva nde ne, kanya kwetɛŋe yɛ biya ta ŋkɛ le bezlea ŋkɛ, kadzeghe ta dzeve kwetɛŋe.
Tupurri: AÀ hay dega'dega'a. AÀ joñ pektoraln de rabge äoge. Depaçaçge äe hay nen ngaä sañtimeder do äog ti dwee äañ po boñ. Diy äen dosen no lay. AÀ hay de rabge ti keçeç äoge.

Francais: On le garnit de quatre rangées de pierres : une rangée de sardoine, de topaze, d'émeraude: première rangée;
Anglais: And they set in it four rows of stones: the first row was a sardius, a topaz, and a carbuncle: this was the first row.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ci hiɗiyn talamu, zlaram kuɗ tuwam fiɗi. Ma zlaray jewna yum ala: Sardowan, topaz hiɗi emerode.
Bulu: Ane be nga bé mekoʼo minnoñ minyin été; nôfét wua, sardôan wua, tôpaze wua, émerôd wua:
Guiziga: A gakaŋ wuya ti ɗugur mupuɗaw puɗaway, cinjah cinjah mufaɗa: cinjih mudumbuŋ i  ɗugur   mupuɗaw gagaza ndez,  ɗugur  mupuɗaw tapasl tapasl waɗ  ɗugur meɗelek meɗelek .
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe takki kaa'e marɗe saman dow maaka, jabbi nayi. Jabbol aranol: Sardiyus, tupas, imiradi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe takki kaa'e marɗe saman dow maaka, jabbi nayi. Jabbol aranol: Sardiyus, tupas, imiradi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa aa o be toka-ta sɛnɛ tɛ fara naar: tɛ kuti nɛka-a, wa aa nɛ ta-kui nɛ‘i sa'e sardɔan, ta nɛ yí-a ɔ tàrà nɛ‘i sa'e topaz, in tu̧ ta mít-mít nɛ‘i sa'e emerod.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa aa o be toka-ta sɛnɛ tɛ fara naar: tɛ kuti nɛka-a, wa aa nɛ ta-kui nɛ‘i sa'e sardɔan, ta nɛ yí-a ɔ tàrà nɛ‘i sa'e topaz, in tu̧ ta mít-mít nɛ‘i sa'e emerod.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ rafekɛ le zəɗəa pelɛ nyi nza zləvə te hɛ wəfaɗe: ma kwa kwa ghate ta zəɗə ne, pelɛ kwa ghɛmɛ, kwa rəghwə rəghwə ba'a kwa mede mede ya shɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ yer huuli ne hen see de sraëge tiëtië naa. Ti sra'ge ma tañgun mono diñ: Huuli Sardwan boñ, huuli Topas boñ, huuli Emerod boñ.

Francais: deuxième rangée : une escarboucle, un saphir, un diamant;
Anglais: And the second row, an emerald, a sapphire, and a diamond.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma zlaray sem ma'na: grenat, safir hiɗi diyamaŋ;
Bulu: nnoñ baa ô too, nôfét wua, safir wua, diamañ wua.
Guiziga: Cinjih mucuw naŋ i  ɗugur mupuɗaw   gagaza los los,  ɗugur mupuɗaw   ngil ngil waɗ ɗugur mupuɗaw gingiliw gingiliw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jabbol ɗiɗaɓol: Haako-haakoore, safira, yaspa.
Fulfulde_DC: Jabbol ɗiɗaɓol: Haako-haakoore, safira, yaspa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ yiitoo nɛka-a, nɛ́ gbɛ̧ ta yúŋú-yúŋú nɛ‘i sa'e ɛskarbuklɛ, tu̧ ta hee yiwese ga nɛ‘i sa'e safir, in toka-ta nɛ‘i sa'e jaspɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ yiitoo nɛka-a, nɛ́ gbɛ̧ ta yúŋú-yúŋú nɛ‘i sa'e ɛskarbuklɛ, tu̧ ta hee yiwese ga nɛ‘i sa'e safir, in toka-ta nɛ‘i sa'e jaspɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa kwa bake ta zəɗə ne, pelɛ kwa gheme, kwa lɛa lɛa ghweme ba'a kwacaregesla ya shɛ.
Tupurri: Ti sra'ge ma de äogn mono diñ: Huuli Eskarbukle boñ,

Francais: troisième rangée : une opale, une agate, une améthyste;
Anglais: And the third row, a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma zlaray sem ɦidina: Opal, agat hiɗi Ametiste;
Bulu: Nnoñ lale, ôpale wua, agat wua a amétiste wua;
Guiziga: Cinjih mimakir naŋ, i  ɗugur mivirziŋŋe  ,  ɗugur muwuy wuy   waɗ  ɗugur miwit wit .
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jabbol tataɓol: Yakintus, agate, ametistu.
Fulfulde_DC: Jabbol tataɓol: Yakintus, agate, ametistu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ taar nɛka-a, nɛ́ ŋga ta nɛ‘i sa'e agat, gbɛ̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e kɔrnalin in ta nɛ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ‘i sa'e ametist.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ taar nɛka-a, nɛ́ ŋga ta nɛ‘i sa'e agat, gbɛ̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e kɔrnalin in ta nɛ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ‘i sa'e ametist.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa kwa mahekene ta zəɗə ne, pelɛ kwa gatawəfa gatawəfa, kwa jiɓe jiɓe ba'a kwa ndereme ndereme ya shɛ.
Tupurri: huuli Safir boñ, huuli Diyamañ boñ. Ti sra'ge ma de swa'n mono diñ: Huuli Opal boñ, huuli Agad boñ, huuli Ametisd boñ.

Francais: quatrième rangée: une chrysolithe, un onyx, un jaspe. Ces pierres étaient entourées de rosettes d'or dans leurs garnitures.
Anglais: And the fourth row, a beryl, an onyx, and a jasper: they were inclosed in ouches of gold in their inclosings.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma zlaray sem fiɗina: krisolit, oniks hiɗi yaspis. Nam ka ciy gaa hoɗoɗ hoɗoɗ'.
Bulu: Nnoñ nyini, krizôlit wua, yaspe wua. Mekoʼo mete me mbe nsoman biôm bi mvot été.
Guiziga: Yo cinjih mumufaɗ naŋ i  ɗugur kalaf kalaf  ,  ɗugur mupuɗaw kakayak kakayak   waɗ  ɗugur kalaf kalaf gagaza zlop zlop . Ɗugur gar na, i mingbaˀa avu  ɓiri tapasl tapasl   jozl jozlo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jabbol nayaɓol: Kirisoliti, haako-haakoore, onikis. Ɗe nastinaaɗe nder jogorɗe ɗe kaŋŋeeri.
Fulfulde_DC: Jabbol nayaɓol: Kirisoliti, haako-haakoore, onikis. Ɗe nastinaaɗe nder jogorɗe ɗe kaŋŋeeri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ naar nɛka-a, nɛ́ mbui ta nɛ‘i sa'e krizolit, toka-ta kɛn-kɛn nɛ‘i sa'e beril in tu̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e oniks; wa lɛŋ ya kɔ̧ ɓoo lɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ naar nɛka-a, nɛ́ mbui ta nɛ‘i sa'e krizolit, toka-ta kɛn-kɛn nɛ‘i sa'e beril in tu̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e oniks; wa lɛŋ ya kɔ̧ ɓoo lɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa kwa wəfaɗe ta zəɗə ne, pelɛ kwa sleke sleke, kwa gheme gheme ba'a kwa nɛ nɛ ya shɛ. Kendeɓe ndeɓe yayata pelɛ te ŋkwa nya kefi fi le mze kwa tere tere.
Tupurri: Ti sra'ge ma de naan mono diñ: Huuli Krisolid boñ, huuli Oniks boñ, huuli Jaspe boñ. Huuli sen hay wo go de degar ti de el ti ngeel maga aè gir jag äaara go de boo biñni ni mono.

Francais: Les pierres étaient selon les noms des fils d'Israël, douze selon leurs noms; elles étaient gravées comme des cachets, chacune avec son nom, pour les douze tribus.
Anglais: And the stones were according to the names of the children of Israel, twelve, according to their names, like the engravings of a signet, every one with his name, according to the twelve tribes.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam noŋ pet doogo yam ma', ŋray hiɗi sem gurona vi Israyel; ɗoy gaa'a ki tampoŋ nala, jafna vi Israyel sa doogo yam ma'na semda visi ka ɗoy hayam kafe.
Bulu: Mekoʼo me nga luʼan a môé me bone be Israél; me mbe awôm a mebaé, avale ane môé mab me né; me mbe nkpwelan ane besitam, akoʼo ese e beʼe jôé da ya meyoñ awôm a mebaé ya Israél.
Guiziga: Ɗugur gar na, slimiɗ ngi mangal ngi Zakop nguɗ nguɗ ava, tiɗeˀe kuruˀ nga cuw taŋ, kaɓa matohom gwat ngi ɗuva slimiɗ ngi mburu. A bigi sukwi ngi Israyeley mukuruˀ nga cuw na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal kaa'e waɗi sappo e ɗiɗi bee inɗe ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila, bana binndi ta'aaɗi diga cehoowo kaa'e bana haatummeere. Hayre fuu koo ndeyeere bee innde lenyol gootol.
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal kaa'e waɗi sappo e ɗiɗi bee inɗe ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila, bana binndi ta'aaɗi diga cehoowo kaa'e bana haatummeere. Hayre fuu koo ndeyeere bee innde lenyol gootol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ta nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-yiitoo hee duk o be  Israɛl  ga. Wa gɔna dap duk o be  Israɛl  kpɔk kpɔk zu o ta nɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i gɔn nɛ dap  tumbal  ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ta nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-yiitoo hee duk o be  Israɛl  ga. Wa gɔna dap duk o be  Israɛl  kpɔk kpɔk zu o ta nɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i gɔn nɛ dap  tumbal  ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te yayata pelɛa shɛ ne, pa mbeli tsaslate sləa kwete wəndəa ŋwalea Zhakob nyi meŋe bakeghəmbe, kala nya tsehe lamba ta wəndə mbeli. Pelɛa shɛhɛ ya te ŋkwa hwelefe ta Israyɛl nyi meŋe bakeghəmbe.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo äuy hwal ti äog, de ngaäge de ëu jar ni Israyel wo. AÀ hay wo de caage do maga aè krig kase nono. Ëu weere Israyel ma hwal ti äogn wo de yerge see huuli ma honla äuy.

Francais: On fit pour le pectoral des chaînettes d'or pur, tressées en forme de cordons.
Anglais: And they made upon the breastplate chains at the ends, of wreathen work of pure gold.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot jaɓna hiɗi or ma bay-rigasna, ciliy ki zigewn nala.
Bulu: Be nga kôme bone bengôkop be mvot ébutaʼa tôé yôp, be too ntiñan ane minko.
Guiziga: Ngi juwa jiiba ngi didaka, a ɗiyam sen memeɗehey cuw, ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, slap slap kaɓa maslupam zeweɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi haa jiiba wiɓɓere callalluhoy kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi ɗiɗoy, mbamaakoy bana ɓoggi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi haa jiiba wiɓɓere callalluhoy kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi ɗiɗoy, mbamaakoy bana ɓoggi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɓaɓa sa̧a̧ lɔr e zu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɓaɓa sa̧a̧ lɔr e zu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha wəsə nya kwa hatea shɛ ne, pa mbeli vɛsəte livə bake yitea mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe, kendere ndere kala mampə,
Tupurri: AÈ joñ cen kleere kerëed ti pektoraln de boo biñni de see äe tawa, de deege do saale nono.

Francais: On fit deux chatons d'or et deux anneaux d'or, et on mit les deux anneaux aux deux extrémités du pectoral.
Anglais: And they made two ouches of gold, and two gold rings; and put the two rings in the two ends of the breastplate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gaŋam ma' pete nisi lum kulo jiŋiliŋ hiɗi ora, kot girliŋ-ora ma', girliŋ-ora ma ma'na nisi cum goy gaŋ sligar-ŋoŋŋa,
Bulu: Be nga bo fe mimbekaʼa mi mvot mibaé a bilondo bi mvot bibaé; ane be nga futi bilondo bibaé e mekuʼu mebaé ya ébutaʼa tôé.
Guiziga: Mivay ngi jiiba ngi didaka ti muŋ, a tufam gwat ngi luw naŋ cuw ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl waɗ ɓalaŋ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapaslay cuw ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi jogorɗe ɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri e kalagaaje ɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri. Ɓe peɗi kalagaaje man haa seɓattooji jiiba wiɓɓere ɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi jogorɗe ɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri e kalagaaje ɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri. Ɓe peɗi kalagaaje man haa seɓattooji jiiba wiɓɓere ɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɗafa mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-kana yiitoo nɛ lɔr in kana-lɔr yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa e o kana nɔ‘i sɛn mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ ŋgɔn yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɗafa mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-kana yiitoo nɛ lɔr in kana-lɔr yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa e o kana nɔ‘i sɛn mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ ŋgɔn yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: tsagha ŋkwa nyi bake kefi fi le mze kwa tere tere ba'a takase nyi bake le mze kwa tere tere kezha hwepe mɛa sleme nyi pelɛghə va wəsə nya kwa hate.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ ëeñëeñ äe wo äog de boo biñni, de boore ma delel delel äog do äeege de boo biñni. AÈ kal heer boore ma delel delel äog do äeegen wo wo go ti jag pektoral ma cwedcwed ma äog wo no.

Francais: On passa les deux cordons d'or dans les deux anneaux, aux extrémités du pectoral,
Anglais: And they put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings on the ends of the breastplate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jaɓ ma ora ma ma'na nisi kalam hay girliŋ ma ka ciy goy gaŋam ma' petna;
Bulu: Nde be nga some minkole mi mvot mibaé e bilondo bibaé bi mbe mekuʼu mebaé ya ébutaʼa tôé;
Guiziga: A juwaka celelu memeɗehey tuwa, kaˀ ti ka kaˀ ti ka avu ɓalaŋhay tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kaɓɓi ɓoggi kaŋŋeeri bamaaɗi ɗiɗi haa kalagaaje gonɗe haa seɓattooji jiiba wiɓɓere.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kaɓɓi ɓoggi kaŋŋeeri bamaaɗi ɗiɗi haa kalagaaje gonɗe haa seɓattooji jiiba wiɓɓere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ nu ɓaɓa-lɔr'i sɛn nu kana nɛ ga̧i̧ mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war ŋgɔn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ nu ɓaɓa-lɔr'i sɛn nu kana nɛ ga̧i̧ mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war ŋgɔn.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli hwepeyi livə nyi bake nyi le mze kwa tere tere te takase nyi bake mɛa sleme ta wəsə nya slape kwa hate.
Tupurri: AÈ hee saale ma äogn wo äil boore ma delel delel do äeege ma äog maga wo wo go ti jag pektoraln cwedcwed mono.

Francais: et l'on attacha les deux bouts des deux cordons aux deux chatons, et on les plaça sur les épaulettes de l'éphod, par devant.
Anglais: And the two ends of the two wreathen chains they fastened in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod, before it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jaɓna ma ma'na ma ka goy hay pel sligar-ŋoŋŋa nisi vum vunam goy voko.
Bulu: Ane be nga some mesu mevoʼo mebaé ya minkole mibaé e mimbekaʼa mibaé mi mbe e mebaʼa bitul ya éfôd mfaʼa ya ôsu.
Guiziga: Mi naŋhay vay mekeleme, a juwaka taŋ avu li luw naŋ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl misi avu zeweɗ ngi juwa jampa, ɓa jiiba ngi didak a ndir ti mbuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Seɓattooji ɓoggi goɗɗi, ɓe kaɓɓi ɗi haa jogorɗe go. Kanje, ɓe takki ɗe dow balbe ɗancikiire, wakeere yeeso.
Fulfulde_DC: Seɓattooji ɓoggi goɗɗi, ɓe kaɓɓi ɗi haa jogorɗe go. Kanje, ɓe takki ɗe dow balbe ɗancikiire, wakeere yeeso.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi nu ɓaɓa-lɔr yiitoo'i wa hɛra tɛ o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-kana yiitoo mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa lati tɛ o nyak Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi nu ɓaɓa-lɔr yiitoo'i wa hɛra tɛ o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-kana yiitoo mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa lati tɛ o nyak Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli hwepete kweci mɛa livə nyi bake nyi te ŋkwa nyi bake kefi fi le mze kwa tere tere te zewe nyi te paslɛ paslɛa va lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe, kezha nza wəsəa shɛ kwa hate.
Tupurri: AÈ taw jag äaara wo pel tawge jag saale ma äog ma ti ëeñëeñ jag saale ma ti efod no.

Francais: On fit encore deux anneaux d'or, que l'on mit aux deux extrémités inférieures du pectoral, sur le bord intérieur appliqué contre l'éphod.
Anglais: And they made two rings of gold, and put them on the two ends of the breastplate, upon the border of it, which was on the side of the ephod inward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot girliŋ-ora mara ma' lo, nisi cum goy hay gaŋ birim-ŋoŋŋa ma pete, hay vunam ma kalaf ɗigiyna ma ka kulo tam sligar-ŋoŋŋa.
Bulu: Ane be nga beta bo bilondo bife bibaé e mekuʼu mebaé ya ébutaʼa tôé, éfase ya été é nga latane éfôd.
Guiziga: A ɗiyam ɓalaŋ mekelemey cuw, a tufaka taŋ avu mi ngi jiiba ngi didaka, ti ruwuy, ti huroˀo, tivi jampa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri goɗɗe ɗiɗi, ɓe peɗi ɗe haa seɓattooji jiiba wiɓɓere ɗiɗi, haa gawargal keeduŋgal ɗancikiire, haa nder muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri goɗɗe ɗiɗi, ɓe peɗi ɗe haa seɓattooji jiiba wiɓɓere ɗiɗi, haa gawargal keeduŋgal ɗancikiire, haa nder muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee ŋma kana-lɔr yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ga̧i̧ mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war fara nɛ ndaɗa ŋmaa in Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee ŋma kana-lɔr yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ga̧i̧ mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war fara nɛ ndaɗa ŋmaa in Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli vɛsəte kweci takase bake le mze kwa tere tere kezha hwepe mɛa sleme nyi kwayite va wəsə nya slape kwa hate, mbe hwə mbe hwə va lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ boore ma delel delel do äeege ma tigriñ äog de boo biñni pa, ga aà kal heer sen wo ti jeñ pektoral ma cwedcwed äog wo no, ti jeñ äe ma nen äil maga de joñge see efodn mono.

Francais: On fit deux autres anneaux d'or, que l'un mit au bas des deux épaulettes de l'éphod sur le devant, près de l'attache, au-dessus de la ceinture de l'éphod.
Anglais: And they made two other golden rings, and put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath, toward the forepart of it, over against the other coupling thereof, above the curious girdle of the ephod.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot girliŋ-ora mara ma' lo, nisi cum gaa kuɗ pel sligar-ŋoŋŋa ma ma'na pete, hay gal ma vokŋa, goboy tam vunam ma tapayna, kulo'o kay kantina vi sligar-ŋoŋŋa.
Bulu: Be nga beta bo bilondo bi mvot bife bibaé a futi bie mebaʼa bitul ya éfôd si, éfase ya ôsu bebé éboñaʼa, e kandé éfôd yôp.
Guiziga: A ɗiyam ɓalaŋ mekelemey cuw ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl tuwa ma, a tufaka asi virzi ngi zeweɗ ngi jampa, ti mbuŋ, avu li juɓ naŋ, ɓalaŋhaya taŋ ti hirnga kanda ngi jampa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kadiboo ɓe mbaɗi kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri ɗiɗi, ɓe ɓili ɗe haa balbe ɗancikiire, wakeere yeeso haa les, haa jokkindirki maare dow taadorgol ɗancikiire.
Fulfulde_DC: Kadiboo ɓe mbaɗi kalagaaje kaŋŋeeri ɗiɗi, ɓe ɓili ɗe haa balbe ɗancikiire, wakeere yeeso haa les, haa jokkindirki maare dow taadorgol ɗancikiire.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa duia o ŋma kana-lɔr yiitoo woyo e tɛ o nyak Efod nɛ war ɗɔɔ nɛ ti, nyɛm nɛ fara hɛra-a sɛn zu kanda Efod.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa duia o ŋma kana-lɔr yiitoo woyo e tɛ o nyak Efod nɛ war ɗɔɔ nɛ ti, nyɛm nɛ fara hɛra-a sɛn zu kanda Efod.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli vɛsəte kweci takase bake ɓiyitsa le kwa mze tere kezha hwepe kwake kwake va zewe nyi te lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe, laka ŋkwa nya kwa kema, te ŋkwa nya ntsəzləyi hɛ mbeli. Samese ke zewe nya dzeyi yitea lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe hwehwepeyi geva takasea shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ boore ma delel delel do äeege ma tigriñ de boo biñni äog pa, ga aà kal heer sen wo gesiñ wer saale ma äuy ma ti efod no, ti pel äe, äiñ yiñgi jag äen, ciñ ti mblaaga efod no.

Francais: On attacha le pectoral par ses anneaux aux anneaux de l'éphod avec un ruban de pourpre violette, afin que le pectoral fût au-dessus de la ceinture de l'éphod; et le pectoral ne pouvait se séparer de l'éphod, comme Yahweh l'a ordonné à Moïse.
Anglais: And they did bind the breastplate by his rings unto the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, that it might be above the curious girdle of the ephod, and that the breastplate might not be loosed from the ephod; as the  Lord  commanded Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi jun vun zigew ma tuwam zim-zimna tam girliŋ ma ka ciy vun birim-ŋoŋŋa, junum vunam hen tam girliŋ ma ciy pel sligar-ŋoŋŋa, kay birim-ŋoŋŋa ma duɓak kulo'o kay kantina vi sligar-ŋoŋŋa, kay jaram ma ja goy hiɗi namɗi, ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagata tam Musus nala.
Bulu: Bilondo ya ébutaʼa tôé bi nga volô na be yemete je e bilondo ya éfôd a nkol ô too blum, nalé ébutaʼa tôé é bo e kandé éfôd yôp, a na é bo te kandan a éfôd. E nga boban avale Nti a nga bendé Môze.
Guiziga: A juwaka ɓalaŋ ngi jiiba ngi didak avu ngi jampa ti zeweɗ ngi zana misi yam naŋ wit wit, ɓa jiiba ngi didak a ndir ti hirnga kanda ngi jampa, ɓa a wus a hirnga jampa ta, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le zleˀe da Moyis.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njokki jiiba wiɓɓere bee kalagaaje maaka haa kalagaaje ɗancikiire. Ɓe njokki ka bee ɓoggol carwinaaŋgol, ngam jiiba wiɓɓere laato haa dow taadorgol ɗancikiire, taa ka seeda bee maare, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njokki jiiba wiɓɓere bee kalagaaje maaka haa kalagaaje ɗancikiire. Ɓe njokki ka bee ɓoggol carwinaaŋgol, ngam jiiba wiɓɓere laato haa dow taadorgol ɗancikiire, taa ka seeda bee maare, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa kun laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ o kana-a tɛ o kana Efod nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa wen ha̧ laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi mɛ duk zu kanda Efod wen ká a̧ tɛɛ yu zu-a. Wa dee mɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa kun laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ o kana-a tɛ o kana Efod nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa wen ha̧ laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi mɛ duk zu kanda Efod wen ká a̧ tɛɛ yu zu-a. Wa dee mɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli jikəte takase nyi te wəsə nya slape kwa hate le nyi te lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe le zewe kwa ndereme ndereme. Ma tsagha ne, kənəa zewe nya dzeyi yitea lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe nza wəsə nya slape kwa hate ba'a kagaŋkəɗə nde te lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe, kala nya gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize we.
Tupurri: AÈ sa' pektoraln le see boore ma delel delel do äeege wo no, wo sa'ge äe see ma ti efod no, de saale ma de seçeç cuwa. Nen maga pektoraln mo hay go ciñ ti mblaaga efod no, nen maga aà mo caa wo äil go de efodn wa, do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis nono.

Francais: On fit la robe de l'éphod, oeuvre du tisseur, tout entière en pourpre violette.
Anglais: And he made the robe of the ephod of woven work, all of blue.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot ŋoŋŋa ma fiyokŋa, nisi cilim kaf kayn hiɗi baraw ma tuwam zim-zimna.
Bulu: Ane be loé ézingi éfôd a éyé é too blum ése.
Guiziga: Jibe ngisi jampa ngi Aroŋ na, i mija ti ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy, munduva naŋ wit wit pal naŋ kine.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Cannyoowo sannyi alkibbaare bee gaaraaji carwinaaɗi,
Fulfulde_DC: Cannyoowo sannyi alkibbaare bee gaaraaji carwinaaɗi,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-tok-laa fura laa nɛ‘i tɛ pi̧ Efod zu a̧‘i nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-tok-laa fura laa nɛ‘i tɛ pi̧ Efod zu a̧‘i nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma rewebe nya seɗe lekwesa nya kənəa rewebe Aron kənə ne, le shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme tsate geva ŋkɛ pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal joñ trawal efod no, de äo'ge diñ de oçoçbe ma de seçeç cuwa äuy tu.

Francais: Il y avait, au milieu de la robe de l'éphod, une ouverture semblable à celle d'une cotte d'arme, et cette ouverture avait un rebord tissé tout autour, afin que la robe ne se déchirât pas.
Anglais: And there was an hole in the midst of the robe, as the hole of an habergeon, with a band round about the hole, that it should not rend.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋoŋ ma fiyok namna nisi hinim wayam goy baŋa'a. Delem ma kal yam hayna nam diŋasli ŋolo kay a nam jet goyɗi.
Bulu: Tyiñ ézingi é mbe ézezañ, é funaʼan ane nyô mbot ékôb é ne ntiñan; be nga bo fe nlokoʼo mbômaʼane ane ézingi ja ye bo te nyabé.
Guiziga: ˀAy naŋ, naŋ kaɓa ngi libiti, i midira gijaw gijaw, ko a ngir ta ndiɗaˀ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: waɗi daande haa caka maare, bana daande sulkewol. Daɗɗaare taari daande man ngam taa nde seeka.
Fulfulde_DC: waɗi daande haa caka maare, bana daande sulkewol. Daɗɗaare taari daande man ngam taa nde seeka.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa gɔna ger laa'i tan see-a, ɓɛɛ wa tok nú-a zik lɛŋ nɛ̀ garaazi ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ ndota-a wen ká tɛɛ a̧k.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa gɔna ger laa'i tan see-a, ɓɛɛ wa tok nú-a zik lɛŋ nɛ̀ garaazi ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ ndota-a wen ká tɛɛ a̧k.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezha seɗe ne, ŋkwa welɛ yaslate mbeli te tepe ve. Ketsa tsa ŋkwa nya dzeyi yitea welɛa shɛ kezha ɗema nde kaŋkwahe.
Tupurri: Ti gisiëgi trawaln mono, soole äe yañ de menge ni, go de dam jag gedeñ gedeñ go ti äe degarra äuy nen maga aà mo ngar go wa.

Francais: On mit au bord inférieur de la robe des grenades de pourpre violette, de pourpre écarlate, de cramoisi, de lin retors;
Anglais: And they made upon the hems of the robe pomegranates of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and twined linen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gaa hay gaŋamu nisi jun ɦoro-ɦorona ma tuwam ɗoy zim-zimna, ma tuwam ɗoy cih-cihna ma tuwam slawna hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna.
Bulu: Be nga bo bibuma bi too blum, mfô a évele, ntiñan a mvosan minsinga, mfaʼa ézingi ja ke ja jombô.
Guiziga: A gaka wuya da mi ngi jibe vay ruwuyo zlar, a jam gwat loŋ loŋ kaɓa yi ngi hunduruk, a jaka ti ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy, munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe, ndezze waɗ gugumay mislirkeɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa gawargal alkibbaare ɓe mbaɗi ɓiɓɓe rummaanooje ɗe gaaraaji carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa gawargal alkibbaare ɓe mbaɗi ɓiɓɓe rummaanooje ɗe gaaraaji carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa fura o ŋma be mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o waya kóɓò zik nɛ naŋ-a kpa lɛŋ nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa fura o ŋma be mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o waya kóɓò zik nɛ naŋ-a kpa lɛŋ nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli tsate yɛ ya ta kwakweme dzeyi yitea rewebea shɛ le shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ ba'a le pawa nyi berete berete.
Tupurri: Ti jag trawaln mono, aè kal saë grenad maga see äe de seçeç cuwa ni, de ma de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ, de saale leçeç ma kefkefe.

Francais: on fit des clochettes d'or pur, et l'on mit ces clochettes au milieu des grenades, sur le bord inférieur de la robe tout autour, au milieu des grenades:
Anglais: And they made bells of pure gold, and put the bells between the pomegranates upon the hem of the robe, round about between the pomegranates;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot gilereŋŋa hiɗi ora ma bay-rigasna, nisi jun gilereŋ jar ɦoro-ɦorona, ŋuyum goy hay gaŋ ŋoŋ-ma-fiyokŋa noŋ cusl' jar ɦoro-ɦorona.
Bulu: Be nga kôm fe bone mebenge me nya mvotô a futi me zañe bibuma mbômaʼane a ézingi ése e zañe bibuma.
Guiziga: A ɗiyam mawiyerey ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, a luwaka taŋ zlar avu mi ngi jibe, kulaˀ kulaˀ ar wala ngi yi ngi hundurukoy tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi leŋngi kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi. Ɓe njo'ini leŋngi hakkunde rummaanooje, haa gawargal alkibbaare taarotooŋgal fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi leŋngi kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi. Ɓe njo'ini leŋngi hakkunde rummaanooje, haa gawargal alkibbaare taarotooŋgal fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa duia o be mana nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ wa a zaŋ nɛ ŋmaa in o fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in be waya kóɓò zik ká̧ naŋ-a lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa duia o be mana nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ wa a zaŋ nɛ ŋmaa in o fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in be waya kóɓò zik ká̧ naŋ-a lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli vɛsəte yɛ ciŋəci mze kwa tere tere nya wɛŋe ba'a hwehwepeyi hɛ dzeyi yitea rewebe, dzawa kwelɛ yɛ ya ta kwakweme.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ kondoloñn wo de boo biñni. AÀ kal saë kondoloñn wo ti holañ grenad wo no, go ti jag trawaln degarra äuy ti holañ grenad wo no.

Francais: une clochette et une grenade, une clochette et une grenade, sur le bord de la robe tout autour, pour le service, comme Yahweh l'avait ordonné à Moïse.
Anglais: A bell and a pomegranate, a bell and a pomegranate, round about the hem of the robe to minister in; as the  Lord  commanded Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gilereŋ kep, ɦoro-ɦoro kep; gilereŋ kep, ɦoro-ɦoro kep, ŋuyum goy hay gaŋ sligar fiyokŋ kafe, kay li lopna, ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagata tam Musus nala.
Bulu: Abeñge da ébuma jia, abeñge da a ébuma jia, mbômaʼan a ézingi ése, avale Nti a nga bendé Môze.
Guiziga: Yi ngi hunduruk pal, mawiyer pal, yi ngi hunduruk pal, mawiyer pal, zlar wãˀ avu mi ngi jibe ngi mezegwele, kaɓa Buymisemuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le zleˀe da Moyis tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: leŋnguru e rummaanoore, fahin leŋnguru e rummaanoore, haa gawargal alkibbaare taarotooŋgal fuu, ngam huuwugo kuugal limanku, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
Fulfulde_DC: leŋnguru e rummaanoore, fahin leŋnguru e rummaanoore, haa gawargal alkibbaare taarotooŋgal fuu, ngam huuwugo kuugal limanku, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i in o be mana nɔ‘i nɛka naŋ gasa laa ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zik kpa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i in o be mana nɔ‘i nɛka naŋ gasa laa ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zik kpa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli mbembeɗete yɛ ya ta kwakweme le yɛ ciŋəci dzeyi yitea rewebe kemene slene, kala nya gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize.
Tupurri: Kondoloñ joñ de sa'ge ka'a, grenad joñ ka' lay, kondoloñ joñ de sa'ge ka'a, grenad ka' lay, haçaç go ti jeñ roä ma joñren degarra äuy, do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis nono.

Francais: On fit les tuniques de lin, oeuvre du tisseur, pour Aaron et pour ses fils;
Anglais: And they made coats of fine linen of woven work for Aaron, and for his sons,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kot sligar-tuwna hiɗi baraw-haɓna, ciliya, kotom kay Aaron hiɗi gurona valamu;
Bulu: Be nga loé melôʼô me nya ndomboo, mbamba ntiñan, asu Aron a bone bé;
Guiziga: A dirba nah, a jam zana mekelemey ti gugumay mislirkeɗ da Aroŋ ati ziri naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bee kuugal cannyoowo, ɓe cannyi toggooje bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi, ngam Haruna e ɓikkoy muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Bee kuugal cannyoowo, ɓe cannyi toggooje bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi, ngam Haruna e ɓikkoy muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa toka ŋma gɔna be laa yɛ́m-yɛ́m ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa toka ŋma gɔna be laa yɛ́m-yɛ́m ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka tsa lekwesa tsate lekwesa ganji le pawa kezha yɛ Aron le ŋwalea ŋkɛ,
Tupurri: AÈ joñ oçoçbe ma kluuri de leçeç ma kefkef ne Aaron wo de jar ni äe.

Francais: la tiare de lin, et les mitres de lin servant de parure;
Anglais: And a mitre of fine linen, and goodly bonnets of fine linen, and linen breeches of fine twined linen,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jakawata hiɗi pokita nisi kotom hiɗi baraw haɓna, kayni mi ganta visiya; kalesoŋŋa nisi kotom hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna;
Bulu: A ôzomezome ntôm ô too fe nya ndomboo, a mintôm mife mia liti éjijine jap, mie fe mi too nya ndomboo; bikuba bi ndombo é ne ntiñan.
Guiziga: yo jiiku ngi gugumay mislirkeɗ waɗ kalsoŋ ngi gugumay mislirkeɗ slirkeɗey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi boo meetaleewol bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi e kufneeje bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi ngam fawne e sirlahoy bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi boo meetaleewol bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi e kufneeje bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi ngam fawne e sirlahoy bee gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee mɛtɛwol in mɔɔ-hɛr-zu ká bá nɛ̀ laa mɛ ɗɔɔ nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee mɛtɛwol in mɔɔ-hɛr-zu ká bá nɛ̀ laa mɛ ɗɔɔ nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Kapsiki_DC: tsagha zlave pawa kepeɗe ghə, derə pawa, kwampi pawa nyi berete berete
Tupurri: AÈ joñ jugu moobe ma kluu no, de leçeç ma kefkefe, de jugu wo de leçeç ma kefkefe, ga joñge diñ ma bag rage de wore. AÈ joñ cirla de leçeç ma kefkefe.

Francais: les caleçons blancs de lin retors; la ceinture de lin retors, en pourpre violette, en pourpre écarlate et en cramoisi, damassée, comme Yahweh l'avait ordonné à Moïse.
Anglais: And a girdle of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet, of needlework; as the  Lord  commanded Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kantina nisi kotom hiɗi baraw haɓna ma duɓarayna, tuwam ɗoya; tuwam zim-zim, tuwam cih-cih, slawi kaw, ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagata tam Musus nala.
Bulu: Be nga bo fe ases a nya ndomboo a ne mvosan, ntiñan blum, mfô a évele avale Nti a nga bendé Môze.
Guiziga: Yo kanda mutufa gijaw gijaw ti gugumay mislirkeɗ, lahaɗ ti ngwic ngi tumuŋhoy munduva naŋ wit wit, cihhe waɗ ndezze, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le zleˀe da Moyis tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e taadorgol tuppitaaŋgol ngol gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
Fulfulde_DC: e taadorgol tuppitaaŋgol ngol gaaraaji leŋ ɗigguɗi baalaaɗi e carwinaaɗi e boɗeeji seɗɗa e boɗeeji coy, bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee o kanda nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, in nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ. Nɛ wi-iŋ-tom-aa a̧ dee dea-a, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee o kanda nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, in nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ. Nɛ wi-iŋ-tom-aa a̧ dee dea-a, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a zewe nya hwa hwə nya le pawa nyi berete berete, welaɗe mbe shintia təmə nyi kefi fi le yirə kwa ndereme ndereme, kwa gheme ba'a kwa ghɛmɛ, kala nya gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ mblaaga de leçeç ma kefkefe, de äo'ge de seçeç cuwa, de seçeç burburi, de seçeç yiñyiñ, do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis nono.

Francais: On fit d'or pur la lame, diadème sacré, et l'on y grava, comme on grave sur un cachet : Sainteté à Yahweh.
Anglais: And they made the plate of the holy crown of pure gold, and wrote upon it a writing, like to the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi beɗ or ma bay-rigasna goy goor heberek', kay bogoray ma ɗifinna, nisi ɗo hayamu ki san ɗo hay tampoŋŋa nala, nisi ɗo ala: Peldetta tam Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Be nga bo ékat kuron é ne étyi a ébaʼa mvot, e nde be nga kpwelé été yôb ane ba kpwele sitam na: Etyi be Nti!
Guiziga: A dirba nah wãˀ so na, a ɗiyam gwat mabigi vula slra da mbur, gwat toh toh ava, fiteɗ fiteɗ kaɓa mafutuɗam gwat ngi ɗuva slimiɗ ngi mbur, a tohoko na: «I muvula le da Bumbulvuŋ.»
